attributes.title: Senior Software Engineer
attributes.description:
• You have experience with at least one of the following languages: Java, Go, Elixir and know your way around AWS.

attributes.projects:

With a founder‚Äôs mentality and a 'team-first‚Äô attitude, our diverse teams across Europe, South America and the United States work together to ensure that small business owners can be successful doing what they love.
As part of our vision to become a truly global IT organisation, we have started to build out local, autonomous, cross-functional squads that can take an aspect of our product and perfect it from concept to execution with full autonomy. As a Software Engineer, you will be a part of our new squad in Chile, which means that you will have the freedom to experiment with new things and apply your ideas in our products.

  • Foster a culture of pair programming and amazingly run monitoring and alerting for our products

attributes.title: Application Engineer Sr
attributes.description:
• Knowledge of at least one microprocessor/DSP architecture
  • Embedded systems programming
  • Embedded programming in C/C++ and assembly code
  • Strong problem solving ability and debug through verification capability
  • Excellent oral and written communication skills (English)
  • Ability and desire to learn.
attributes.projects:
We‚Äôre the world‚Äôs leading provider of solutions for designing and verifying advanced silicon chips. And we design the next-generation processes and models needed to manufacture those chips. We enable our customers to optimize chips for power, cost, and performance‚Äîeliminating months off their project schedules.
If you share our passion for innovation, we want you!
attributes.functions:
This position requires a highly motivated and experienced individual to work with Synopsys‚Äô customers on efficient integrating and usage of leading-edge Synopsys processors and security IP into their ASIC SoC/systems for next generation products.
The position offers opportunities to work on state-of-the-art Synopsys IP and the latest industry specifications/applications on various hot market segments. The position will provide IP integration guidance to customers throughout their SoC flow to resolve technical challenges, perform integration reviews at key milestones and support silicon/system bring-up.
Masters/Bachelors graduates with 3-5 years experienced engineers are welcome.
Key responsibilities:
¬∑ Provide ARC support to Synopsys's world-wide customers and field teams
¬∑ Strong problem solving ability for RTL, firmware, and applications
¬∑ Provide technical content for Synopsys support site (Application Notes, Technical Articles, FAQs)
¬∑ Feedback to R&D and marketing on product use models, quality, and enhancements
¬∑ Participation in product review and release process
32698BR
Inclusion and Diversity are important to us. Synopsys considers all applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, military veteran status, or disability.
attributes.benefits:
• Health coverage (Great Health coverage! ;) )
  • Dental insurance (Great dental Coverage ;) )
  • Life insurance
  • Flexible hours
  • Paid sick days
  • Meals provided
  • Vacation on birthday and Birthday present
  • Free car parking
  • Library
  • Wellness program
  • Relocation offered
  • Internal talks
  • Bicycle parking
  • Digital library
  • Company retreats
  • Synopsys Chile covers computer repair expenses.
  • Computer provided
  • Education stipend
  • Performance bonus
  • Personal coaching
  • Informal dress code
  • Recreational areas
  • Vacation over legal
  • And the list goes on...
attributes.desirable:
• Experience of hardware development using Verilog for ASIC or FPGA development including Usage of RTL coding (Verilog/System Verilog), logic simulation and synthesis, timing analysis, and verification methodologies
  • RTL Coding (Verilog/System Verilog/System C)
  • Some experience in Cryptography and Security IP technologies
  • Previous customer facing experience desirable
  • Experience with firmware for signal processing
  • Domain knowledge of ISS (instruction Set Simulator) and FPGA emulation
  • Comfortable with System C or System Verilog Platform development
  • Knowledge of Perl, Shell, TCL/TK scripting languages
  • Knowledge of silicon level implications on area, low power, and speed performance
  • Knowledge using compilers, linkers, assemblers and debuggers and run subset test programs on
  • Experience with a DSP CPU core and a DSP assembly language

attributes.title: Senior Back-end Software Engineer
attributes.description:
• 5+ years of engineering experience. You have previous success developing and shipping core services that scale and are consumed and relied on by a variety of engineers.
  • You're product-minded. You take initiative to understand production intention, team goals, business context, and user problems to propose improvements, eliminate gaps, and reduce risk in the project. You contribute to and drive the team roadmap with product and design. You meet with stakeholders across the company when needed to eliminate gaps in your knowledge. You work closely with design to create a world class User Experience.
  • Security-minded. You have a detailed understanding of security protocols like OAuth2/OIDC/JWT. You understand client-side cookie authentication and JWT. You should have an understanding of front-end security risks and how to mitigate them.
  • In-depth knowledge of microservice/cloud and enterprise architecture patterns. You have a track record of success in architecting and building distributed applications in the cloud. You design for efficiency, reliability, and resiliency and know when to make trade-offs between them. You have experience with messaging/pub-sub systems such as SNS/SQS, ActiveMQ, RabbitMQ, or similar.
  • You have some experience with web technologies including JavaScript (React), HTML, and CSS. While you may not be spending your time developing in these, you have a decent understanding of them and know how to coordinate with those who are.
attributes.projects:
From the Mayflower to the moon landing, every venture relies on insurance. The $1 trillion insurance industry is fundamental to our economy and society, but remains stuck in the stone age. Incumbents rely on antiquated pen-and-paper process and there's a huge opportunity to transform it through technology. At Newfront, we're building software to supercharge insurance brokers and help them deliver a delightful experience to clients.

While we‚Äôre a technology-driven company, we believe that people and trusted relationships matter. Newfront believes in empowering people rather than "disrupting" them. Our singular mission is to create the future of work for this massive industry.

We believe breakout growth creates breakout opportunities and diversity drives innovation.
attributes.functions:
As a Platform Engineer at Newfront, you will work with a team building core services and features across the platform. This will allow product engineers to have the building blocks they need to quickly stand up product features that scale. There are tons of challenging technical problems to solve that directly impact the lives of your teammates and Newfront clients.

Newfront scales by hiring brokers who join with their book of business. Through automation and artificial intelligence, we eliminate paperwork and pay brokers a higher split of their commission revenue. We represent a paradigm shift in the industry and career path for tens of thousands of brokers.

What you'll work on

  • Participate in the development of core services and features: You'll be involved during core service discovery and you'll contribute to the technical design process. You are product-minded and able to collaborate with a Product Manager to define the roadmap and vision. You'll be responsible for speccing and building out features and infrastructure.
  • Participate in the development of core libraries and frameworks that other engineers will use on a daily basis.
  • Mentor other engineers: You will work with other engineers on your team to help them grow and develop their skills.
attributes.desirable:
• Proficiency in NodeJS and Typescript
  • Experience with Dependency Injection Frameworks
  • Understanding of containerization technologies such as Docker
  • Experience deploying services in AWS using Terraform
  • Passionate about building frameworks that other engineers will use

At Darwin Homes, we fundamentally believe that the rental experience is broken. Too often, property management‚Äîserving as the middleman between investors and residents‚Äîoften means shoddy service, hidden fees, and inefficient processes that shortchange everybody involved.

Darwin was built to make residents and investors lives easier through an innovative ecosystem of technologies. We have created the best product in the market for residents to discover, tour and lease their future home; and for investors to have complete peace of mind from our modern management and leasing services built around our core values of transparency and professionalism.

Darwin Homes is the destination for single-family rental services for property investors and residents.
attributes.company.data.attributes.benef:

The founders and executive team have over 30+ years of combined experience in scaling disruptive technology and operations-focused businesses. Darwin Homes is backed by top Silicon Valley venture capital.

Note: This position is fully remote however the majority of the team is based in Austin,TX.

attributes.title: Integrations Engineer (Python)
attributes.description_headline: What will you need to succeed in this role?
attributes.description:
• Experience developing with Python.
  • Experience with relational databases.
  • Be able to connect Cornershop by Uber with other systems in various ways: REST APIs, SFTP, CSV files, etc.
  • Understand the basics of HTTP communication: REST APIs, HTTP methods, response codes, headers, payloads, etc.
  • Know how to process data with Pandas and Numpy.
  • Know how to write basic SQL queries.
  • Understand how ORMs work (SQLAlchemy, Django ORM, etc).
  • Know how to test your code.
  • Communicate in Spanish or English, especially in writing
attributes.projects:
Cornershop by Uber is an on-demand grocery app that gives you free time, while your groceries and errands are delivered right to your door. We're a fast growing company operating throughout Latin America and North America, and since our acquisition by Uber, we just keep getting bigger. Relaunched under our new brand name, Cornershop by Uber, we‚Äôre looking to avoca-grow our team. So, if you want to work in an innovative environment, with a startup footprint, people who live for bad jokes and dad humor, you've come to the right place!
How many people are needed to create an application that simplifies the purchase of food from users? At least 600 because that‚Äôs the number of people who are part of our team of engineers, who work in different countries in South and North America.

We look for engineers who thrive when empowered to find solutions like to dive into systems, iterate quickly, and solve problems in a complex and diverse ecosystem.
attributes.functions:
• Design and implement integration flows between business services, middleware, and third parties using a variety of different platforms, APIs, databases, CSV, protocols, and data formats.
  • Participate in code review with other developers to ensure that each integration maintains a consistent level of technical standards set by the team.
  • Write maintainable and well-tested code making sure it works well in production using the right monitoring systems.
  • Develop integrations in collaboration with external partners that are designed and implemented as reusable building blocks, as appropriate, to enable more efficient integrations.
  • Work with other teams to introduce new data sources to ensure our integrations adhere to consistent and scalable patterns and Cornershop requirements

Cornershop es un servicio que te lleva el s√∫per y distintas tiendas de especialidad, a tu casa o donde quieras, en una hora. Somos una de las Startups con mayor crecimiento en Latinoam√©rica: estamos en Chile, M√©xico, Per√∫, Canad√°, Colombia, Brasil, Estados Unidos y pr√≥ximamente en nuevos pa√≠ses.

Parte de nuestra misi√≥n es crear un servicio simple e intuitivo, que logre ser lo m√°s automatizado posible y que, por lo mismo, logre escalar de forma org√°nica. Los problemas los resolvemos a trav√©s de Software y nuestros equipos trabajan, piensan y hablan con y desde la tecnolog√≠a.
attributes.company.data.attributes.proje:
Cornershop by Uber es una app de servicio de entrega a domicilio que te da tiempo libre, ya que tus pedidos de supermercados y tiendas especializadas se entregan directamente en tu puerta. attributes.title: Semi Senior Rails and React Developer
attributes.description:
Our current tech stack includes a Ruby on Rails monolith, Haml/Vanilla JS/Stimulus/React at the frontend, PostgreSQL and Redis databases, MemCache, and Elastic Search servers, and Sidekiq to execute background jobs. Then, Amazon S3 and SES, CloudFront, Mixpanel, and Stripe.
We never stop learning ‚Äîand you will learn a lot with us‚Äî but when it comes to the list below, we expect to you know about:
  1. Ruby and RoR, JavaScript and React. You care about performance, code legibility, and elegance.
  2. Git commands and git workflow.
  3. PostgreSQL.
  4. Code endpoints for REST API.
  5. Programming in general. Your code is clean and simple, you know and use encapsulation, abstraction, polymorphism.
  6. Writing and reading in Spanish and English. We are a remote team, which demands being great at communicating ideas or document processes.
attributes.projects:
Did you hear about Get on Board? Well, you‚Äôre looking at it right now üòâ. We are set to shape and transform the digital job market in Latin America, giving startups and tech innovators the spotlight they deserve and helping talented digital professionals find better, more fulfilling workplaces.
We can only realize this mission if we expand and grow, and this is where you come into play.
attributes.functions:
Our product was born a technology company, so we serve code for breakfast every day and it is very important it tastes and looks good. You will:
  1. Work side by side with the UX and UI teams.
  2. Face challenging problems that need high levels of abstraction in order to design simple solutions.
  3. Leave the code better than you found it.
  4. Solve bugs.
  5. Code a lot of tests in all their flavors.
  6. Write documentation. Knowledge is useless unless other people have access to it, and we are obsessed with documenting everything we know or learn.
  7. While senior developers will support your work, you will also mentor and pair with entry-level engineers to help develop their skills.
  8. Review a lot of code. Expect some days with five or six pull requests.
  9. Talk to and support our customers and users frequently via chat, mail, or phone. We code for them, so we like to talk to them.
  10. Once you'll get more experience within the team, you'll be able to build epic features that go through the whole stack: Ruby on Rails, React, SQL, background jobs, and/or integrate with APIs.
  11. You will be part of a collaborative environment. At Get on Board we are a team, and it's important to support each other in the company.
attributes.benefits:
We are an unconventional, contrarian company, and you‚Äôll definitely enjoy working with a small team of smart people in a no-bullshit, respectful, honest, and extremely agile environment.
Enjoy working in one of the first fully remote startups of Latin America (7 years and counting!).
In addition to that:

  • Flexible work: as long as you deliver, you will enjoy a fully flexible schedule. This job is compatible with family, kids and homeschooling, sports, music bands, and hobbies.
  • Truly remote work. As long as you maintain at least 5 hours of overlap with GMT-3 timezone and have fast Internet, you can be wherever you want.
  • A compensation that grows permanently alongside your performance.
attributes.desirable:
You will stand out if you:
  1. Contribute to one or several open source project(s) üí™
  2. Have worked remotely before. It sounds easy but working without people around for hours and with all the distractions of the internet is challenging and takes skills
  3. Know other programming languages. Being polyglot is a blessing.
Also: sadly, the tech industry has a lot of biases and prejudices. If you have had to overcome any kind of bias (gender, sexual, racial, nationality, class) in order to forge a career as a senior dev, we WANT to meet you.
attributes.modality.data.attributes.name: Full time
attributes.company.data.attributes.name: Get on Board
attributes.company.data.attributes.descr:
This is us! 
We are set to shape and transform the digital job market in Latin America, giving startups and tech innovators the spotlight they deserve and helping talented digital professionals find better, more fulfilling workplaces.
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
Get on Board is the biggest tech recruitment platform in Latin-America, with 600,000+ job applications sent. It offers modern tools for recruiters and a simple, curated experience for job seekers.

Thousands of startups and enterprises from Latin-America and the US trust Get on Board‚Äôs integrated platform and exclusive data on candidate performance to speed up their remote recruiting and lower dramatically their sourcing costs.

Meet the Gobers

We are a small, distributed team working remotely from Chile, Peru, Spain, Mexico, Argentina, and the USA. We are not defined by degrees or titles, as we come from different areas of knowledge, such as art, design, music, pedagogy, journalism, psychology among others.
We don't believe in hierarchies, and we all work together hand-by-hand towards the same goal: to promote awesome jobs for awesome people. That's our ethos.

Our Culture: Public by default

As we work remotely, we trust each other in making every piece of information available to the team, avoiding the 'bus factor' and ensuring transparency at all times. That's why everything is public by default, so nobody becomes a bottleneck in our daily tasks.

üëâüèΩ Check out our Handbook on Remote Work here. (Content in Spanish)

Want to know more about us and what we do?

üëæ Join our community on Discord

üéß Listen to our Podcast 'Working Without Borders'

üìì Check out our blogs:
- https://www.getonbrd.com/blog
- https://medium.com/getonbrd
- https://medium.com/get-on-board-dev
- https://medium.com/get-on-board-design

attributes.functions:
How many engineers does it take to build an app that simplifies grocery shopping for users? At least 600, because that‚Äôs how many we have in our Engineering team, working from different countries in South and North America. The Engineering team is dedicated to produce intuitive technology for customers, shoppers and stores and solving challenges along the way.

This role will have the mission to support the creation, generation and visibility of real-time metrics that are relevant to our business and enhance decision making through data. In order to further increase scalability, it will be necessary to generate metrics working with streaming.

What will you do?

- Create of pipelines that will generate real-time metrics.
- Plan, design and execute software engineering projects through best practices.
- Generating alerts and monitoring systems that generate, process and store data.
- Analyze and adapt the context and business requirements in order to generate metrics, from the creation and generation of events and consumers.
- Work together with different Engineering teams (Backends Engineer, Data Engineering, Infrastructure, BI Engineers, among others).
- Interact with different areas of the business to understand needs and metrics requirements.

attributes.title: Front-end Engineer
attributes.description_headline: What do you need to succeed?
attributes.description:
• Have experience with JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React and/or Angular;
  • That challenges motivate you to constantly learn in a self-taught way;
  • That you understand concepts like one-way data flow, immutability, encapsulation, and component architectures;
  • That you have knowledge and/or familiarity with native APIs of the web platform;
  • That you have mastery of tools for the automation of software development processes;
  • That you can communicate in English.
attributes.projects:
Cornershop by Uber es una app de servicio de entrega a domicilio que te da tiempo libre, ya que tus pedidos de supermercados y tiendas especializadas se entregan directamente en tu puerta. Somos una empresa de r√°pido crecimiento que opera en Chile, Brasil, Per√∫, Colombia, M√©xico, Costa Rica, Estados Unidos y Canad√°, y desde nuestra adquisici√≥n por Uber, seguimos creciendo. Relanzada bajo nuestra nueva marca Cornershop by Uber, buscamos hacer crecer nuestro equipo. As√≠ que, si quieres trabajar en un entorno innovador, con una cultura de startup, gente que vive de dad jokes y el buen humor, ¬°tu lugar est√° con nosotros!

Now on we are changing to English because we need you to feel comfortable reading, talking and speaking from the very beginning!
attributes.functions:
How many people are needed to create an application that simplifies the purchase of food from users? At least 600, because that‚Äôs the number of people who are part of our team of engineers, who work in different countries in South and North America. The engineering team is dedicated to producing intuitive technology for customers, buyers and stores, and to solving the challenges that arise along the way.

Cornershop has thousands of scale challenges so you can apply creativity, skill and experience to participate in the creation of optimization tools for different internal processes and propose improvements.

At Cornershop we are looking for a Frontend Engineer to join the team that develops the Apps used by hundreds of thousands of Shoppers and customers every day.

What will you do?

- Design and build data-intensive web applications with a friendly interface, using React, JavaScript / HTML / CSS.
- You will use tooling tools and libraries, such as webpack, sass, redux, mobx, among others.
- You will use good software engineering practices such as Clean Code, testing, CI / CD, etc.
- Consume REST APIs
- Work with CSS and / or CSS-in-JS pre-processors.

  • That you work in a proactive, responsible and creative way.
  • That you embrace diversity, interculturality and be tolerant
  • You like to constantly learn not only about your work: that you have a hobby, enjoy making things and are a positive contribution to the team

attributes.title: Junior Web Developer

- Web technologies: Responsive design, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and JSON
- Web services: REST implemented using NodeJS / NestJS

- Be familiar with modern dev tools including GitHub, CI/CD, and Docker
attributes.projects: If you‚Äôre one of the new generation devs or maybe a self-taught developer looking for a career, Reign is an excellent match for you. We‚Äôre a company that loves new tech and new people, where you‚Äôll get the opportunity to focus on learning and writing great code that underpins and supports your team‚Äôs technical decisions. Our clients are large national and international companies like Coca-Cola Embonor, SMU Unimarc, Millicom International, and many more; we work with them in their enterprise-wide software and we‚Äôre looking to welcome a new member into our dev team!
attributes.functions: We‚Äôre looking for developer grads that want to make a fresh start in the tech industry. Our ideal recruit will be always honest and asking lot of questions to their seniors. From Reign we hope you receive the right answers, to get you learning about our practices and needs. Our team fully embraces Agile rituals and methodologies and you will work the full development cycle, from design to implementation, hand to hand with top-notch talent. You will learn and maintain software applications with cutting-edge technologies and serverless architecture and you will also have the chance to improve your skills directly from our headless technology partners like Contentful, ElasticPath, Algolia, CommerceLayer, among others.

attributes.title: Full-Stack Developer
attributes.description:
As a Full Stack Developer, we're not just looking for someone who works methodically but also who can approach and solve problems cleanly. We want you to be able to put your knowledge and best practice to work!

  • Strong working knowledge in server-side development using Node.js
  • Experience in front-end development using frameworks like React or Angular
  • Strong knowledge of JavaScript and TypeScript
  • Familiarity with cloud architecture on AWS, Google Cloud, Serverless Architecture and CDNs
  • Familiarity with the concept of Continuous Delivery and Continuous Integration pipelines.
  • Experience using testing frameworks (Unit Testing, E2E testing, etc.)
  • You'll definitely have worked in a multidisciplinary team that uses agile methodologies like Kanban/Scrum
  • Experience and familiarity with different types of databases (Key-value, Document store, Object store, Relational databases, etc.)
attributes.projects:
Fancy a challenge?

If you've got a few years' experience working as a Front End Developer, Reign would make a great choice for your next step.

We're a company that loves new tech, where you'll get the opportunity to focus on learning and writing great code that underpins and supports your team's technical decisions. With agile methodologies and processes at our core, you won't be stuck in loads of useless meetings every day; you'll be working flexible hours to fit in with your own needs, in an environment where you can make your voice heard. Our clients are large national and international companies like Coca-Cola Embonor, SMU Unimarc, Millicom International, and we're looking to welcome a new member into our top-notch team!
attributes.functions:
We're looking for an experienced Back and Front end coder with 3-5 years' experience.

Our ideal teammate would be someone comfortable working with development frameworks and library management, who can produce and scale software solutions alongside a multifunctional team. They'll be working across the software development lifecycle, from design to implementation. So, if you're able to work independently and responsibly, writing clean, solid code, then this could be your perfect job.

As a Full Stack developer, you'll be working with dev teams and product managers to bring software solutions to life, constantly innovating to build and improve products.

Responsibilities

  • Design client and server-side architecture
  • Build great-looking app frontends
  • Write effective APIs
  • Test software for efficiency and responsiveness
  • Review, refactor and update software
  • Design in and implement security and data protection methodologies
  • Build apps and features with responsive mobile design
  • Author technical documentation
  • Work with data scientists and data analysts to improve software
attributes.benefits:
Once we've received and reviewed your CV, we'll email to let you know how well we feel you'd fit into the role. If you make it to the next round, we'll send you a test to complete. Make sure you give it your all!

If your test goes well (we'll have several people reviewing it, so do your best) we'll be in touch about an interview. If there's anything important that you need to know before the interview, let us know and we'll do our best to help.

attributes.projects:
Reign is an approachable, smart and international team of people who love developing apps and web solutions. We have comfortable offices in Santiago, near the biggest green area in the city.

Reign was founded by designers and developers so we created a work environment to suit you: plenty of quiet spaces to work, free coffee and access to the latest devices to tinker with. Our processes are agile, avoiding unnecessary meetings. We run regular tutorials on interesting programming, managing and design topics.

Since 2015 we‚Äôve been helping our clients around the world. We believe our diverse, focused, talented team makes us highly effective and helps us bring a fresh and open attitude to everything we do.
attributes.functions:
We are looking for an experienced Back-end developer to join our team! As a Back-end Developer, you will be responsible for the server-side web application logic, modeling data structures, choosing the right databases for the project requirements, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the Front-end. You will also be responsible for integrating the Front-end elements built by your coworkers into the application. A basic understanding of Front-end technologies is therefore necessary as well.

If you have outstanding programming skills and a great passion for developing high-scalable and innovative applications, then you will love this job.

If you‚Äôre also familiar with Agile methodologies, we‚Äôd like to meet you.

Responsibilities

  • Developing and maintaining all server-side components
  • Ensuring optimal performance and responsiveness to Front-end requests
  • Collaborating with Front-end developers on the integration of elements
  • Designing customer-facing Back-end services for various business processes
  • Developing high-performance applications by writing testable, reusable, and efficient code
  • Implementing effective security protocols, data protection measures, and storage solutions
  • Running diagnostic tests, bug fixes, and providing technical support
  • Documenting processes, including database schemas, as well as preparing reports
  • Recommending and implementing improvements to processes and technologies
  • Collaborate with a multidisciplinary team of designers, developers, project managers, and DevOps.

attributes.title: Front-end Developer
attributes.description:
• Proven work experience as a Front End developer

  • Experience using modern web technologies in React or Angular
  • Knowledge of some web development tools like Webpack, Babel, ESLint, Jest, Enzyme, Redux
  • Good understanding of concepts like Server Side Rendering, Static Site Generator, CDN, Headless CMS, JAMStack, etc.
  • Be familiar with the concept of pipelines for Continuous Delivery and Continuous Integration and have used at least one platform like CircleCI, GitLab, Github Actions, Travis CI, or Heroku Pipelines
  • GIT, Github, Git flow, and experience with Code Review
  • Having been part of a multidisciplinary team and have used Agile methodologies like Kanban / Scrum
attributes.projects:
Fancy a challenge?

If you've got a few years' experience working as a Front End Developer, Reign would make a great choice for your next step.

We're a company that loves new tech, where you'll get the opportunity to focus on learning and writing great code that underpins and supports your team's technical decisions. With agile methodologies and processes at our core, you won't be stuck in loads of useless meetings every day; you'll be working flexible hours to fit in with your own needs, in an environment where you can make your voice heard. Our clients are large national and international companies like Coca-Cola Embonor, SMU Unimarc, Millicom International, and we're looking to welcome a new member into our top-notch team!
attributes.functions:
We are looking for a Front End Developer to produce scalable software solutions. You‚Äôll be part of a cross-functional team that‚Äôs responsible for the full software development life cycle, from conception to deployment.

As a Front End Developer, you will be responsible for implementing visual elements that are visible from the computer user‚Äôs vantage point within a web application. You will combine the art of design with the science of programming. You will be responsible for the translation of UI/UX design wireframes to actual code.

If you‚Äôre also familiar with Agile methodologies, we‚Äôd like to meet you.


Responsibilities

  • Work with development teams and product managers to ideate software solutions
  • Build the front-end of applications through appealing visual design
  • Develop new user-facing features
  • Write reusable code and libraries
  • Developing and implementing highly responsive user interface components
  • Test software to ensure responsiveness and efficiency
  • Build features and applications with a mobile responsive design
  • Work with data scientists and analysts to improve the software
  • Enhance application for maximum speed and scalability
  • Collaborate with team members and stakeholders
  • Bridge the gap between graphic design and technical implementation
  • Translate UI/UX design wireframes to actual code.
attributes.benefits:
Once we've received and reviewed your CV, we'll email to let you know how well we feel you'd fit into the role. If you make it to the next round, we'll send you a test to complete. Make sure you give it your all!

If your test goes well (we'll have several people reviewing it, so do your best) we'll be in touch about an interview. If there's anything important that you need to know before the interview, let us know and we'll do our best to help.

attributes.projects:
Crear negocios es un viaje complicado y divertido. En ID, tenemos la creencia compartida que las personas iniciamos negocios para aportar valor al mundo, sea mediante propuestas gastron√≥micas, entretenimiento, salud, arte, tecnol√≥gicas u otras. Sin embargo, el d√≠a a d√≠a operativo/administrativo puede consumir todo tu tiempo y energ√≠a.
El prop√≥sito de ID es brindar herramientas y servicios que hagan el d√≠a a d√≠a de los negocios m√°s sencillo para que puedan dedicarse a brindar el valor por el cual fundaron su empresa. Adem√°s, buscamos incentivarlos a crecer de manera m√°s r√°pida y ordenada de la mano a herramientas tecnol√≥gicas.
En ID, trabajaras con equipos multidisciplinarios (UX, UI, Frontend, Backend, Devops, Customer Success, etc.). Podr√°s experimentar la experiencia de tus usuarios mediante cross training (empresarial) y co crear con nosotros las soluciones que nos permitir√°n ayudar a los negocios y cumplir nuestro prop√≥sito.

attributes.company.data.attributes.descr: Jooycar is a platform for Smart Connected Cars. If you are interested in IoT, Mobile Dev, Big Data, Real-time processing, Artificial Intelligence, High scalability, Cloud, UX, Extreme programming, and top edge technologies..  this team is for you.
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
We are Jooycar, innovative technology drivers for more secure and informed mobility. We seek to generate more satisfactory connected-car and usage-based insurance (UBI) experiences.

We believe our passionate and diverse team combined with technology and innovation is the way to generate value in our customers to become the leading Insurtech in Latin America.

We have been recognized for our ability to put innovation into practice as we are part of the INSURTECH 100 list of the world's most disruptive companies in the sector.

Our Values

Passion to Win: We are passionate about winning big, we believe in ourselves, and what we are after for, we put all the energy into what we do, with enjoyment and ambition.

We build from People: We are committed to the integral development of people and teams, generating contexts that display the potential, authenticity, professional and personal growth in each of us.

We do it Differently: We like to challenge the status quo and the way of doing things. We enjoy working in an agile mindset, open to discussion and learning at all levels.

We operate as owners: We avoid waste at all levels, we do more with less, we don't waste time on what doesn't add value, we think about maximizing value in the long term.

We never cross the line: We know that we handle very sensitive data, so we always base our relationships and decisions on transparency, care, and honesty.

Until the last Mile: We act with excellence and ensuring quality at every step of the process, to the last mile, pending to deliver results that radically improve the user experience and our clients.

attributes.projects:
About Gain

Gain is an easy-to-use tool that automates the gathering of feedback and approvals from clients or stakeholders, specifically designed for marketing assets. We automate menial tasks in the marketing workflow so teams can better use their time on more meaningful work.

We are a lean startup. Our founders bootstrapped this company and we grow thanks to the love we get from our users, not because of venture capital money. We‚Äôre a remote team across the U.S., Argentina, Puerto Rico, Colombia, and Mexico, on a mission to simplify approval workflows for everyone.

You can learn more about what we do at https://gainapp.com
attributes.functions:
As a Backend Python/Django Engineer, you'll be working with the dev and product teams to develop and maintain Gain's main backend. You will:

  • Work under our Senior Backend Engineer to implement new features and extend existing ones
  • Participate in architectural decision-making for backend implementations
  • Collaborate with front-end developers, designers, and the rest of the team to deliver well-architected and high-quality solutions
  • Fix bugs and performance problems
  • Write clean, readable, and testable code

attributes.title: CTO
attributes.description:
+5 years working on startup environment
Senior technical knowledge to be able to lead the tech development.
Business and operations understanding is required.
Proven capabilities to design and implement a tech solution.
Should be able to build and lead a team.
Focus on User Experience.
Focus on Product.
Experience tracking performance.
Fit with a fast paced and growing company.
Share our purpose of allowing more people to own a vacation home
attributes.projects:
Legria is a new startup with strong funding to support growth. Our purpose is allowing more people to own a second home to build their happiest memories.
We are executing the first stage, which is acquiring over 5 houses in the beach in Chile and then selling fractions of each house to different co-owners, where they will be able to use the house according to their ownership.
This will require a platform that shows the properties, explains how the co-ownership model works and allows to acquire these shares.
At the same time, we need to develop the platform to allow a fair distribution of the house usage among co-owners, while coordinating all aspects of property management.
Our plan is to rapidly expand to other vacation destinations in Latam.
attributes.functions:
The CTO will lead all technology aspects of Legria in a Co-Founder position.
Since this is an early stage startup, it's an invitation to join us from the beginning to design the best way to introduce tech in our business model. Specifically this implies designing the smart scheduling process for our co-owners, the property management platform to interact with co-owners and our internal property management information systems.
We are 2 full time Founders, Ignacio Del Rio and Pedro Mir.
As Legria grows, the CTO will need to incorporate resources and build a larger team, which requires leadership skills.

attributes.modality.data.attributes.name: Full time
attributes.company.data.attributes.name: Legria
attributes.company.data.attributes.descr: Legria es una startup que permite cumplir el sue√±o de tener una segunda casa.
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
Tener una segunda casa es un lugar que ta da alegria y que a la vez es una buena inversi√≥n. Legria es una startup que permite cumplir el sue√±o de tener una segunda casa. Esto lo logra dividiendo la propiedad de la casa en acciones para luego venderlas, donde cada comprdor podr√° usar la casa en la proporcion de tiempo de la que es due√±o.
La tecnologia es lo que permite que la copropiedad funcione, permitiendo que los copropietarios puedan agendar de manera equitativa su tiempo, tener visibilidad de los gastos y administraci√≥n, comunicar sus necesidades a Legria y tener la posibilidad de vender su participaci√≥n a trav√©s de la plataforma.
attributes.company.data.attributes.proje:
Legria is a new startup with strong funding to support growth. Our purpose is allowing more people to own a second home to build their happiest memories.
We are executing the first stage, which is acquiring over 5 houses in the beach in Chile and then selling fractions of each house to different co-owners, where they will be able to use the house according to their ownership.
This will require a platform that shows the properties, explains how the co-ownership model works and allows to acquire these shares.
At the same time, we need to develop the platform to allow a fair distribution of the house usage among co-owners, while coordinating all aspects of property management.
Our plan is to rapidly expand to other vacation destinations in Latam.

attributes.title: Senior Golang Engineer
attributes.description:
Requirements:
  • 5+ years of backend engineering in a distributed systems
  • 2+ years in Golang or 5+ using several languages you were able to quickly pick up
  • Strong knowledge of a variety of database systems (Graph, relational etc.)
  • Experience working with 3rd party APIs and OAuth
  • Comfortable with strong dev ops culture
  • Strong communication skills in English and experience working as part of a remote team
  • Need to be located in timezones UTC-4 through UTC-8 (The Americas)
  • Excited to travel internationally for company retreats (twice a year)
  • Favorite Ted Lasso quote
attributes.projects:
Our mission is to help software teams get more done. Over the past decade there has been an explosion of specialized tooling in the enterprise. It‚Äôs putting the burden on each of us to jump between different apps and tabs to get our work done and at the end of the day we‚Äôre wasting valuable time. We believe there is a better way. Our ambition is bold: build the best platform for software teams to get their work done.
We‚Äôre just getting started and are looking to grow the team to help us accomplish our mission. We love what we do and are motivated by working on a product that we enjoy using ourselves. You would have an immediate impact as a builder and user influencing product. You would join the early team as a founding engineer and have full ownership working closely with our founders. Come join us!
attributes.functions:
Who we‚Äôre looking for
We are looking for a full-time backend engineer. Our ideal candidate has 5+ years of experience building event driven micro-services or service oriented architectures and has built most facets, if not all, in a "twelve-factor" app. Preference is for real experience (2+ years) in our primary language of Golang, but other languages are considered when able to quickly pick up new technologies. Additional experience in integrating with 3rd party systems, event-driven architecture, databases, and cloud services (AWS, GCP, etc) are important.
You will directly influence how and what to build, and must be comfortable collaborating on the architecture, code, product, etc as we have a strong culture of devops as well as being technically curious, thoughtful and purposeful in what we build. We value deploying frequently with well-written, maintainable, instrumented and tested code to a kubernetes cluster.
Responsibilities:
  • Develop new products and features in a small team
  • Collaboration with the team to solve technical problems and help shape the product direction
  • Provide technical input and knowledge to the planning, design, and requirements process for new products and features
  • Review other software engineers' code for correctness, style, and completeness
  • Support your team's production software by responding to an occasional alert or bug report
  • Write integration tests and work with our product team to ensure the operation and correctness of new features

attributes.title: Application Engineer
attributes.description:
• Fundamental understanding of Synthesis and Place & Route engines, and how they interact with each other to deliver high quality QoR.
  • Solid foundation in IC physical design flow, device physics, VLSI, UNIX, HDL (Verilog/VHDL) and/or CAD engineering.
  • Knowldege of advanced node technologies (10nm, 7nm, 5nm) are required.
  • Knowledge of timing corners/modes, process variations and signal integrity related issues are required.
  • Knowledge of circuits, logic design and a scripting language (e.g. Perl, Python or Tcl) are required.
  • Ability to be proactive and have a strategic mindset in addition to having tactical problem-solving experience.
attributes.projects:

attributes.functions:
We‚Äôre looking for Application Engineer join the team.
Possesses a full understanding of specialization area plus working knowledge of multiple related areas. Unsupervised resolves a wide range of issues in creative ways on a regular basis. Customarily exercises judgment in selecting methods and techniques to obtain solutions. Performs in project leadership role. Contributes to complex aspects of a project.

Creates and develops approach to solutions. Work is collaborative in nature. Provides regular updates to manager on project status. Represents the organization on business unit and/or company-wide projects. Guides more junior peers with aspects of their job. Frequently networks with senior internal and external personnel in own area of expertise.
Provides technical and engineering insight and direction to support and improve usability, applicability and adoption of products, platforms and solutions to meet customer business needs. Diagnoses, troubleshoots and resolves complex technical issues on customer installations; deploys and trains customers on new implementations and capabilities.

Reviews and understands feedback on product and solutions performance from customers and other application partners; works directly with Research and Development (R&D) to develop and implement technical roadmap, specifications and validation for improvements and enhancements. Partners with customer technical managers and Sales to identify business challenges, develop effective technical solutions for new accounts and increase utilization and retention of products on current accounts. Key Leveling Differentiators: -Complexity and type of products/platform supported -Balance of technical and customer relationship management capability -Scope of responsibility and net impact of the role to the business

attributes.title: Software Engineer Sr
attributes.description:
The candidate should possess a minimum of 5 years of software development experience in C with an emphasis on systems-level programming on Unix. Experience with Unix signals, multi-threading, synchronization mechanisms, socket programming, Unix system calls, Unix shell scripting, Perl scripting, use of debuggers, and proficiency in developing software on many variants of Unix is required.

Preference will be given to candidates having prior experience in Application Security/Cryptography and exposure to assembly programming. Experience developing applications using FLEXlm is desirable, though not a requirement. Experience with licensing and other security systems will be of added advantage.

  • Technically strong in C/C++ with emphasis on system-level programming on UnixProficient in data structure and algorithms.
  • Good understanding of software intricacies with respect to Unix signals, multi-threading, synchronization mechanisms, socket programming, Unix system calls, and use of software debugging tools Proficient in Unix shell scripting, Python, Perl, etc.
  • Knowledgeable in software security and cryptography algorithms
  • Sound understanding of Machine Learning models and their application to solving problems Familiarity in designing cloud-native applications and solutions on AWS, Azure, Google, etc.
  • Exposure to various database technologies like NoSQL, Relational, Distributed, etc.
  • Ability to solve Bigdata problems

attributes.functions:
The candidate in this position will be part of the R&D efforts for implementing and supporting software security and licensing initiatives at Synopsys. Responsibilities include working on new releases of the Synopsys Common Licensing code from inception to deployment while ensuring that the resultant product works in a heterogeneous environment.

The candidate is expected to identify and formulate the key problems to be solved and develop state-of-the-art solutions. Must be able to balance multiple demands in a fast-paced environment, should act quickly using good judgment, and be self-motivated. The candidate should help achieve tangible results, demonstrate accuracy, thoroughness, and display commitment to excellence in product performance, reliability, and robustness. They should exhibit the ability to learn and apply new skills. Also, be tuned to current developments and trends in licensing technologies and security concepts.

Somos el banco l√≠der del Per√∫ desde hace m√°s de 130 a√±os, acompa√±ando e impulsando el desarrollo de todos los peruanos. Desde hace 4 a√±os, estamos inmersos en una Transformaci√≥n que ha impactado en nuestra cultura, procesos, estructura, productos y canales. ¬øEl objetivo? Ofrecer una Experiencia WOW a nuestros clientes.

con m√°s de 16,000 profesionales de diferentes perfiles y con distintas experiencias.

¬°Importante! Este NO es lugar para ti si:

‚Ä¢Te gusta siempre hacer lo mismo. En el BCP nunca nos aburrimos, pues tenemos retos diferentes, donde podemos dise√±ar y ejecutar proyectos que desaf√≠an el status quo con soluciones innovadoras.

‚Ä¢Prefieres ir por lo que ya conoces. Aqu√≠ emprendemos y aprendemos, siempre buscando explorar y cuestionar con nuevas ideas, probando una y otra vez sin miedo al error.

  • Knowledge around PEP8 standards, as well as linters, such as Flake8 or Pylint.
  • Experience working with unit testing using Unittest (standard library) or Pytest. message queuing services (RabbitMQ or SQS), as well as the services that support these services (AWS Lambda or Celery).
  • Knowledge around security standards like OWASP.
attributes.projects:
Crack the Code is a female-founded coding startup revolutionizing K-12 education in Latin America by providing much needed computer science training in a fun, simple and accessible format for Spanish-speaking children 5 to 18 empowering them to become future leaders.
Crack the Code offers live online computer science and coding classes for small groups of students and individuals. The structured learning programs are composed of several courses according to the age and interests of the students and take place in a fun and rewarding environment leveraging gameplay elements. Crack the Code teaches small groups students, up to no more than 6 children at a time, from all over the region, and offers monthly, bi-monthly or yearly learning curriculums.. The brand also has social-focused, K-12 educational curriculums and works with public/private schools and universities to provide easy-to-implement programming.
attributes.functions:
As our new Back-end developer you will be a key team member and will be working together with the Frontend, Design and Product teams to ensure the creation, planning, optimization of our learning platform. Making sure to follow the best security guidelines, and to give our students the best possible experience.
Who are you?
  • You are self motivated and energetic; people look up to you and enjoy working with you and trust in you.
  • You are eager to learn in a fast paced environment and you are a proactive team player.
  • You are not afraid of challenging the status quo and taking new risks.
  • Your empathy and humbleness allows you to learn from everyone.
  • You own your achievements but you also take responsibility for your mistakes, always seeing them as personal and professional growth opportunities.
attributes.desirable:
• Cloud ecosystem and tools, such as AWS and Google Cloud
  • Experience with FastAPI
  • Experience using search engines such as Elasticsearch.
  • Query optimization knowledge.
  • Experience in non-relational databases such as DynamoDB.
  • Familiarity with SQLAchemy, Kubernetes, Terraform, Gitlab CD/CI.
  • Serverless framework or chalice.

Crack The Code provides the latest in digital skills education to kids and teenagers in Latin America, preparing them for the digital era we live. Crack The Code offers a blended Computer Science curriculum designed for each student age group where students learn how to code, understand tech, and create and use technology responsibly.
We are a hardworking, ambitious, fun team that is looking to transform education in Latin America.

attributes.projects: SpacePointe is a global fintech company with platforms processing across 12 countries. We are looking for a senior PHP developer to join our amazing team! We‚Äôre looking for a developer that gets excited about regularly encountering new software challenges to solve across a wide variety of projects. We highly value team members that can take ownership of a problem, find a good solution, and move a project to completion. Between our care for development practices and the variety of projects you‚Äôll encounter, you are likely to learn and grow as a developer while working here.
attributes.functions:
• Your primary focus will be the development of all server-side logic, definition, and maintenance of the central database, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end.
  • You will also be responsible for integrating the front-end elements built by your co-workers into the application. Therefore, a basic understanding of front-end technologies is necessary as well.
  • Integration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers

attributes.benefits_headline: Some Addition Context on our Work Values
attributes.benefits:
• We‚Äôre quite flat, so you‚Äôll pair with other devs for peer reviews and with our PMs and Designers for ideation sessions.
  • You will be working remotely with a team that was remote pre-pandemic. As such, we emphasize an asynchronous culture that works to limit unnecessary meetings so you can focus on deep work.
  • We value and cultivate enjoyable working relationships among team members and clients and do what it takes to prevent toxicity - even if it means saying goodbye to a client that‚Äôs having a negative impact on the team.
  • We emphasize work/life balance and make sure our people don't get burned out.
  • We encourage pursuing tangential inspirations and do our best to carve out time for team members to build cool things outside of immediate engagements.
attributes.desirable:
• Fantastic communicators. You know how to articulate your reasons for or against critical decisions and can disagree and committing. You equally enjoy giving feedback and receiving advice for both soft and hard skills.
  • Self-starters. You‚Äôre able to handle ambiguity, anticipate problems, and don‚Äôt need to be handed the whole picture to get started. You may have even been a freelancer, consultant, or entrepreneur previously.
  • Non-Dogmatic. You understand that most decisions aren‚Äôt binary and require an understanding of the trade-offs. Similarly, you do your best to try to see things from other people‚Äôs point of view.

attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
En Autofact, somos la empresa de informaci√≥n y tecnolog√≠a m√°s importante en la industria automotriz en Chile. Nacimos hace m√°s de 7 a√±os con el objetivo de hacer de la compra de un veh√≠culo usados un proceso f√°cil, r√°pido y de bajo riesgo. Esto tanto para personas como para empresas.

Entregamos herramientas digitales y servicios de informaci√≥n (ej. http://www.autofact.cl o http://www.autofactpro.com).
Hemos sido reconocidos en varias ocasiones con aportes de capital y premios, por nuestra propuesta innovadora en la regi√≥n (Startup Chile, Capitales Semilla Corfo, Premio BCI Empresario, Empresa Wayra entre otros). Hoy es una empresa de 45 personas con m√°s de US$ 3,8 millones en ventas anuales. Atendemos a m√°s de 140 empresas, tenemos m√°s de 800.000 visitas mensualmente, entregamos m√°s de 35.000 informes de veh√≠culos al mes y realizamos m√°s de 4.000 transferencias de veh√≠culos digitales al mes.
El 2015 empezamos a desarrollar productos para el mercado de Per√∫ y luego para Colombia (2017) y M√©xico (2018), replicando nuestra operaci√≥n en Chile. Hoy contamos con clientes empresas y personas naturales en Per√∫ (www.autofact.com.pe) as√≠ como en Colombia (www.autofact.com.co) y M√©xico (www.autofact.com.mx).
A mediano/largo plazo queremos transformar la forma en la que se compran veh√≠culos usados, asesorando de forma digital y con sistemas inteligentes a personas en su proceso de compra de principio a fin. Luego, llevar este proceso a Latinoam√©rica.

We‚Äôre growing and are looking for passionate developers who enjoy taking on a challenge to join our team. You‚Äôll be working on new and existing products that our customers rely on every day, as well as internal tools to help our system engineers be as productive as possible.
We are an agile company, and our team is based across the world and we make good use of collaboration techniques for remote working.
You'll be reporting to the head of our development and automation team while working in smaller teams on projects allocated per sprint.
attributes.benefits: Why should you come work with us? We have a wonderful team that knows how to ship while being relaxed and friendly. We‚Äôll also support your growth, we want people here for the long term which means we know keeping you happy is vital to both yours and our success.

The above skills are important, but perhaps the most essential part of this job is being a great addition to our team. attributes.company.data.attributes.long_: Nisum Technologies is a global technology consulting firm headquartered in Southern California. Founded in 2000 with the customer-centric motto of Building Success Together, we‚Äôve grown to over 750 consultants and 8 offices across the United States, India, and Chile. Our philosophy and deep technical expertise result in integrated solutions that deliver real and measureable growth. The name Nisum is derived in part from the Persian word Nisbat, which means relationship, engagement, affinity, or alliance. We believe that the stronger the connection we have to you, our client, the more successful you will be in communicating your brand value through technology. We strive for the highest levels of Nisbat through continuous and open communication, which provides simplicity, efficiency, organization, and effective solutions to 21st century business challenges. Whether you‚Äôre a hot start-up, or a major global brand, our approach is the same: forge the most powerful connection possible between people, processes, and products in order to achieve unparalleled success.

attributes.projects: Sngular was founded in Madrid, Spain over 20 years ago as an information technology firm developing custom software solutions for some of the leading financial institutions in Europe. attributes.functions:
**Who we‚Äôre looking for:**
At SNGULAR, we‚Äôre looking for a ** Salesforce senior lead developer** to build our client‚Äôs suite of applications. The client, a mid-size bank, pursues giving its customers a superior range of services (currently unavailable at more traditional banks). If you decide to join us, you will be in charge of a team developing software-based Salesforce CRM and leveraging external resources, working with the bank‚Äôs core banking, external banks, and other third parties. If you are passionate about technology, love guiding others achieve their full potential, and you know how to delegate, this is for you. This position reports directly to the enterprise development program manager, who reports to the CTO. The client is based in Boston, MA, and requires the person to be physically at their office.

You will be developing software based in Salesforce CRM and leveraging external resources to work with our internal banking core, external banks, and other third party services.

* This is a remote position to work with a project and a team based in Boston (MA).

attributes.title: API Governance (Boston)
attributes.description:
What will you need?

  • Experience With REST APIs client and server side
  • Openshift administration/configuration level
  • Jenkins administration/configuration level
  • GitLab administration/configuration level
  • Strong Java EE and SE, spring boot background
  • Verifiable experience in recursion (Not just academic)
  • Knowledge/experience Software Patterns and general Architecture
  • Maven, Nexus
  • Javascript client/server
  • Experience with GitLab‚Äôs API v3 and/or v4 (desirable)
  • Mulesoft development experience and Mulesoft‚Äôs APIs (desirable)
attributes.projects: Sngular is an international tech solutions company developing custom software solutions for some of the leading financial institutions in Europe. Today, we are a team of +900 in the US, Mexico, Chile, Singapur, and Spain providing a wide range of technology solutions to companies around the world. From custom software development to AI, from e-commerce to IoT, we help companies harness and leverage today‚Äôs most cutting-edge digital technologies to create value and grow. As we like to say, if a customer needs it, ‚Äúit can be done". We are a people-oriented company with soul, offering 23 days PTO besides other benefits
attributes.functions:
The goal of the API governance in Sngular will be to focus on the entire API landscape and maximize the value. Will produce policies concerned with versioning, tracking, documenting, deprecating, and integrating, and governing APIs across multiple teams, cloud environments, and gateways.

50% technical 50% management role.

You will work in Boston, however, you could start remotely and relocate in 2-3 months. We will do all the necessary arrangements and cover your visa and relocation costs.

What will you do?

Applying common rules relating to API standards and security policies for the APIs.
Guide and support the development team to follow the API governance standards.
Standardize metadata across APIs to track analytics.
Identifying areas for modification in existing programs and subsequently developing these modifications and testing and evaluating new programs.
High problem-solving skills for troubleshooting, debugging, maintaining, and improving existing software.
Review and validate software written by others.
Handles transformations, schema validation, API virtualization, and more.
Security practices to ensure data transfer via APIs.
Deploying software tools, processes, and metrics. Basic DevOps tools are required.

Each day, ZeroFOX cloud-based, SaaS platform processes millions of posts and accounts across the social landscape, spanning LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Google+, YouTube and more. Forrester recently named ZeroFOX a Leader and Top-Ranked in Strategy for Digital Risk Monitoring in The Forrester Wave: Digital Risk Monitoring, Q3 2016. attributes.company.data.attributes.descr: QX is a white label end-to-end platform that streamlines financial markets processes, enabling efficient automation for the issuance, settlement, custody, management and trading of financial instruments.
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
QuantumX platforms can help banks, stock exchanges, brokers, custodians, arrangers, and other financial institutions to onboard users, share legal, financial and legal documentation, sign contracts, monitor the assets during their life-cycle and trade them when is required.

The platforms successfully integrates serverless technology with blockchain platforms - a web-based, single portal that connects all participants, reducing the need for multitudes of auditors, and accountants for cross-checking the counterparty‚Äôs transaction records.

We are reshaping the capital markets industry and exploring transformational business ideas in the fintech sector.

We are currently working with emblematic financial institutions (from the public and private sectors) to bring together highly disruptive solutions over the current market infrastructure. We are currently leading one of the most important and emblematic projects related to DLT/blockchain space in South America.

We have a flexible work schedule. However, availability to join meetings on regular basis (either in person or virtually) may be required depending on the company and clients need.

We are an equal opportunity employer and we do not discriminate on any basis.

attributes.title: WordPress Developer
attributes.description:
We are looking for a WordPress Developer to join our team. To help with the development of custom WordPress & WooCommerce websites.

The ideal developer should have knowledge of the following:

  • page builders like Oxygen & Elementor can help.
  • how to code custom functions and plugins.
  • how to connect WordPress to external systems via API.
  • Good knowledge of Javascript.

In our company, we value autonomous, proactive people. You should be able to:

  • organize your own work
  • make decisions
  • meet deadlines without needing external pressure or supervision.
  • be located within 2 hours of our time-zone UTC-5

We are looking for someone who can work per project/hours. We believe this role will require about 20 hours per week, but could quickly become a full-time role.

You will be measured by the efficiency on how you complete the tasks assigned to you.

You need to have a high level of English.

To be a qualified prospect, please reply with the word Machupichu at the beginning of your application.

Our clients are based in the US, Europe and Latin America. Our team is made up of developers and online marketers.

The team is fully remote and we are looking for someone to join this team.
attributes.functions:

attributes.projects:
TECLA has been working with top U.S. technology and software companies since 2013. We work with modern stacks and on exciting projects and products filled with rewarding challenges.
We are a fully remote and distributed company and we are lucky enough to have a diverse and multi-national team with team members in the U.S., Mexico, Chile, Peru, Colombia, Argentina, Brazil, Costa Rica, and Venezuela.
This Backend Engineer will be joining our engineering team, working directly with our lead developers, but also collaborating with our product and design teams.
attributes.functions:
You'll help shift the technological landscape within the company through experimentation and auditing of emerging tech stacks, while shaping the way a new technology is introduced to, and adopted by, new audiences throughout the world.
  • You will quickly gain proficiency when exposed to unfamiliar technical patterns, systems, or languages
  • You will be able to unblock individuals when they are faced with technical challenges
  • You will work as a strong communicator who can collaborate well with other non-technical functions (e.g. Product & Design)
  • You will try out new tools, fail fast, and dive into unknowns to solve new and challenging problems
attributes.benefits:
• Two weeks of paid vacation per year
  • 7 paid days for local holidays

attributes.projects:
En Cardda creamos las mejores tarjetas virtuales de pago para empresas, dise√±adas para hacer pagos internacionales. Permitimos que empresas chilenas contraten servicios digitales extranjeros como Google Adwords o AWS sin los l√≠mites de cupo y pagos rechazados propios de las tarjetas de cr√©dito de la banca tradicional.

Empezamos el 2020 y fuimos incubados por Startup Chile y Platanus Ventures. Actualmente formamos parte del batch W22 de YCombinator.

Tenemos m√°s de 50 clientes que est√°n usando las tarjetas de Cardda para hacer sus pagos internacionales, como Notco, Fintual y Kar√ºn.

Es un momento incre√≠ble para entrar a Cardda, tenemos clientes, estamos creciendo mucho y el equipo a√∫n es chico como para que tengas un impacto real en lo que estamos haciendo y construyendo para el largo plazo.
attributes.functions:

Usamos Ruby on Rails para el backend y React para el frontend. Nuestros principales focos de desarrollo son una aplicaci√≥n web para que nuestros clientes puedan crear y gestionar sus tarjetas virtuales y un administrador interno con el que gestionamos las operaciones.

Actualmente estamos implementando nuevas funcionalidades para mejorar la gesti√≥n de gastos de nuestros clientes usando tarjetas de pago y para soportar operaciones a lo largo de todo Latinoam√©rica. Tus principales tareas ser√°n implementar nuevas funcionalidades y crear tests para backend y frontend.

En el equipo somos todos j√≥venes y motivados con lo que hacemos. Lo que buscamos es que:

attributes.title: Tech Lead (Software Engineer)
attributes.description:
Un ingeniero de software 11/10: maestro de la tecnolog√≠a y l√≠der de equipo. La expectativas es que vas a estar en las trincheras programando con nosotros y mientras que empiezas a armar el plan para nuestro equipo.
Impacto en Encuadrado = (Capacidad T√©cnica x Capacidad de Comunicaci√≥n) / Rigidez
  • Capacidad t√©cnica:
    • Full Stack que sepa front-end, back-end, serverless, bases de datos (relacionales y no relacionales), Cloud (AWS idealmente) y todo lo necesario para hacer una aplicaci√≥n (web y m√≥vil) que funcione Conocimiento y hambre de buenas pr√°cticas.
    • Conocimiento de web scraping
  • Habilidades de comunicaci√≥n:
    • Un excelente comunicador (verbal + escrito) y educador. Parte de tu responsabilidad ser√° subir al resto del equipo al carro de la nueva plataforma.
    • Somos creyentes que 1 + 1 = 3, as√≠ que para lograr el √©xito que buscamos sabemos que las cosas se trabajan en equipos con distintas habilidades.
  • Rigidez:
    • Somos una startup, a veces hay que cambiar los objetivos y botar planes a la basura.
    • Al mismo tiempo, tendr√°s que estar preparado para defender tu opini√≥n en los momentos de discusi√≥n y dejarla ir seg√∫n decidamos en equipo.
  • Un l√≠der:
    • Te va a tocar armar el equipo. Tienes que saber vender Engineering en Encuadrado, armar los procesos y documentaci√≥n necesaria para que podamos seguir armando un equipo robusto capaz de crear una plataforma que se ajuste a distintas profesiones, su manera de cobrar, y recibir pagos.
    • En el mundo de la tecnolog√≠a siempre aparece algo nuevo que aprender. Quiz√°s hay que aprender un nuevo lenguaje, quiz√°s hay que aprender a usar una API, quiz√°s hay que aprender a usar un protocolo que no conoc√≠as.

¬øQu√© vas a estar haciendo?
Vas a tener un gran desaf√≠o t√©cnico. Nuestra prioridad siempre ha sido aportar valor a nuestros clientes y darles la soluci√≥n que buscan. Para seguir escalando y creciendo tenemos que salir del paradigma en el que partimos. Tenemos todo hecho en Python Flask con server-side rendering y sabemos que algo que nos beneficiar√≠a un mont√≥n es separar el front-end del back-end. Sabemos que es crucial tener un codebase con altos est√°ndares que permitan a un nuevo developer sumarse al equipo con la m√≠nima fricci√≥n posible.
Durante este a√±o necesitamos hacer una versi√≥n 2 de Encuadrado para as√≠ crear una plataforma robusta que permita escalar a m√°s verticales y pa√≠ses. Mientras dure este proceso, vamos a mantener en funcionamiento la versi√≥n 1 (versi√≥n actual que est√° en producci√≥n).
  • Vas a liderar la creaci√≥n de una nueva versi√≥n de Encuadrado.
  • Evangelizando las buenas pr√°cticas de ingenier√≠a de software en Encuadrado para el equipo que vas a estar armando.
  • Tomar las riendas del reclutamiento de nuevos integrantes al equipo y priorizar los recursos necesarios para cumplir nuestros objetivos.
attributes.projects:
Encuadrado es una plataforma donde profesionales independientes, como nutricionistas, psic√≥logos, doctores, abogados, etc., automatizan y administran las piezas m√°s cr√≠ticas del funcionamiento de su negocio. Esto incluye los agendamientos de las citas de sus clientes, env√≠o de recordatorios, procesamiento de pagos y emisi√≥n de boletas.
Nuestra misi√≥n:
‚≠êQue todo profesional pueda independizarse, crecer y triunfar.
Estamos convencidos de que el futuro es del profesional independiente. Hoy en d√≠a la posibilidad de trabajar definiendo tus propios horarios, con tus propias reglas y generando ingresos completamente para ti es la tendencia que la lleva, no s√≥lo para quienes tienen que agendar sino que para otros profesionales que podr√≠an beneficiarse de la simplicidad de automatizar tareas gracias al pago por Encuadrado.
attributes.functions:
Venimos saliendo de un tremendo 2021:
  • Pasamos por el batch de verano de Y Combinator. (S√≠, la aceleradora de donde sali√≥ Airbnb, Dropbox, Rappi, Stripe, y muchos m√°s)
  • ¬°Crecimos! Sumamos a un mont√≥n de nuevos clientes, empezamos a procesar millones de d√≥lares al mes y tenemos un equipo incre√≠ble.
  • Levantamos una ronda de inversi√≥n para acelerar nuestro crecimiento en el 2022.
En Y Combinator te dicen que una startup es una buena idea si:
  1. El problema es popular y el mercado est√° creciendo.
  2. El problema es caro de resolver.
  3. El problema es frecuente.
Por eso, entrar a Encuadrado es una tremenda oportunidad: el producto es amado por nuestros clientes (tenemos muchos), hay miles de agendamientos al d√≠a y m√°s de un mill√≥n de d√≥lares procesados al mes pero tambi√©n:
‚úÖ S√≥lo en Chile hay m√°s de 2 millones de independientes, en LATAM, m√°s de 50 millones. Y lo mejor de todo, el mercado est√° creciendo.
‚úÖ Muchos usuarios dicen que Encuadrado es el asistente perfecto. Tener un/a asistente es caro. No solo en el costo mensual sino que tambi√©n en horas administrativas. Dejas de ser independiente.
‚úÖ El usuario de Encuadrado agenda y cobra todos los d√≠as y aparte tiene la obligaci√≥n de hacer una boleta por cada agendamiento (fuera de horario).
Estamos reci√©n armando el equipo por lo tanto vas a tener un impacto inmediato en:
  • La cultura de Encuadrado
  • Impulsar el crecimiento explosivo del producto y de nuestros usuarios
  • El desarrollo de un producto con tremendo potencial
  • Participar activamente en armar un equipo de primer nivel
attributes.desirable:
• Javascript: React.js (o alg√∫n otro framework de front-end)
  • Python (o node.js, u otro lenguaje moderno)
  • Ojal√° Flask o alg√∫n otro framework de webserver (express.js o similar)
  • HTML - CSS
  • Cloud y DevOps (idealmente AWS)
  • Bases de datos (relacionales es un must, no relacionales ideal)

attributes.projects:
At Darwin Homes, we fundamentally believe that the rental experience is broken. Too often, property management‚Äîserving as the middleman between investors and residents‚Äîoften means shoddy service, hidden fees, and inefficient processes that shortchange everybody involved.

Darwin was built to make residents and investors lives easier through an innovative ecosystem of technologies. We have created the best product in the market for residents to discover, tour and lease their future home; and for investors to have complete peace of mind from our modern management and leasing services built around our core values of transparency and professionalism.

Darwin Homes is the destination for single-family rental services for property investors and residents.
attributes.functions:

  • Build robust, scalable new features for core products

attributes.benefits:

Darwin Homes is backed by top Silicon Valley venture capital.

Note: This position is fully remote however the majority of the team is based in Austin,TX.

attributes.projects: Talently (500 Startups W19) is an online program for tech professionals in Latam that helps them hack their way to their next remote job by developing their career, tech and English skills. We do so aligning incentives: participants only pay the program‚Äôs full fee once they succeed in getting hired. In average our Talents double their salaries in 12 weeks üî•.
attributes.functions:
We‚Äôre looking for a driven individual to join our team as a Learning Tech Expert. The job‚Äôs goal is to work hand in hand with our Head of Learning in the development of our Tech Track's sync and async content to help our Talents perform better in their technical challenges and coding interviews. We want them to be able to get the jobs they're looking for!

To achieve this goal, you‚Äôll be responsible for these and other activities:

  • Research, benchmark, compile, analyze and/or report tech trends AND hiring trends and how companies assess tech skills in their candidates
  • Propose and design the Tech Track's curriculum
  • Create written content, scripts and engaging learning activities that enhance the async training process
  • Coordinate with the supporting material/media creators and handle tight deadlines (audio, video, graphic design, etc)
  • Work with assessment strategies and data to measure the effectiveness of the content and async activities
attributes.benefits:

  • English in company

  • Birthday Off
  • And so much more!

At Talently we‚Äôre looking for hustlers who have a passion for people, talent and technology. Please apply even if your experience and interests aren't an exact match with what we've laid out in this job description. If this sounds interesting, we want to hear from you. Plus, we're always striving to be a more diverse team ;)
