No importa si no tienes experiencia laboral, podemos ense√±arte y guiarte en c√≥mo hacer proyectos reales en Magnet.
attributes.projects:
Magnet es una empresa de ingenier√≠a enfocada en desarrollar software a medida para entregar soluciones de alta calidad a los problemas de nuestros clientes. Nos gusta entender sus procesos y su negocio para as√≠ entregarles el m√°ximo valor posible.

Hace 9 a√±os comenzamos desarrollando peque√±as plataformas de software, pero hoy trabajamos en proyectos como gestionar las limitaciones operacionales de una aerol√≠nea completa o digitalizar el proceso de migraciones de un pa√≠s.

Si bien somos bastante exigentes en t√©rminos t√©cnicos, ya que tenemos un gran enfoque en la ingenier√≠a, tambi√©n nos dedicamos a pasarlo bien cada vez que podemos. En ese sentido nos esforzamos much√≠simo en tener una cultura abierta, que le permita a todos crecer profesionalmente y sentirse bien en su trabajo, no solo porque entendemos que entregar productos de calidad est√° directamente relacionado a un equipo feliz, si no que porque ese es el tipo de empresa que decidimos formar.
attributes.functions:
Estamos buscando un Analista TI para que se una a nuestra √°rea de desarrollo web. Necesitamos sumar a alguien que trabaje ordenando procesos de negocio y llev√°ndolos a requisitos de software. Siempre en conjunto y supervisado por alguien de m√°s experiencia.

En Magnet enfrentamos los proyectos con un enfoque de equipo por lo que lo m√°s importante es poder relacionarse con los distintos roles. Adem√°s de eso, nuestro Analista TI participar√° en:

  • Levantar requisitos al inicio y durante el proyecto en conjunto con el L√≠der de Proyecto y participar en reuniones con contrapartes definidas por el cliente, con el objetivo de definir lo que se implementara.
  • Construir documentaci√≥n que registre todo el proceso de levantamiento de requisitos que se realice al inicio o durante el proyecto. Esto con el objetivo de ordenar el proceso, facilitar el traspaso a cliente y generar un registro del trabajo realizado.
  • Comunicarse con clientes para reportar el avance semanal del proyecto, coordinar la obtenci√≥n de los elementos/permisos/informaci√≥n necesarios para el desarrollo del proyecto u otra tarea en conjunto con el L√≠der de Proyecto.
  • Trabajar con el L√≠der de Proyecto , con el objetivo de que la planificaci√≥n cumpla con los plazos y requisitos necesarios para entregar valor al cliente.
  • Asistir a reuniones con los clientes de los proyectos en los que trabaja, para comunicar avances, levantar nuevos y potenciales requerimientos y estar disponible para resolver dudas.

Por el momento nos encontramos trabajando todos 100% remoto, por lo que los postulantes tendr√°n que considerar esta modalidad de trabajo. Pensamos tener una modalidad de trabajo mixta despu√©s de la pandemia, pero hay total apertura a un trabajo 100% remoto si el postulante se encuentra fuera de Santiago (ya hay personas trabajando en Concepci√≥n, Colombia, Venezuela, Espa√±a, Valpara√≠so, etc.).
attributes.benefits:
Nos esforzamos en crear un ambiente de trabajo y una cultura que potencie a nuestro equipo. Tenemos una organizaci√≥n horizontal en la que hay espacio para el aporte de todos al tomar decisiones. Fomentamos una cultura abierta para tener feedback constante por parte del equipo y as√≠ mejorar cuando nos equivocamos (somos una start-up, a veces pasa).

Tenemos una oficina, si es que la necesitas. Celebramos los cumplea√±os y planificamos actividades de encuentro de equipo durante el a√±o. Tambi√©n el equipo ha creado varios "clubes secretos" (no tan secretos) que organizan actividades por su cuenta (trekking, cine, after office, etc.).
Adem√°s:

  • El horario es flexible y no te pediremos horas extra, a menos que se est√© acabando el mundo y solo nosotros lo podamos solucionar
  • Seguro de salud complementario

Estamos trabajando remoto desde marzo y no te pediremos volver a la oficina hasta que te sientas seguro de hacerlo.

attributes.title: Lead Front-end Engineer
attributes.description:
• 5+ years of engineering experience. You have previous success developing and shipping a large-scale application with a user-empathetic mindset
  • 2+ years of experience leading an engineering team. You have proven abilities in providing technical direction for a small to medium team of engineers.
  • You're product-minded. You take initiative to understand production intention, team goals, business context, and user problems to propose improvements, eliminate gaps, and reduce risk in the project. You contribute to and drive the teams roadmap with product and design. You meet with stakeholders across the company when needed to eliminate gaps in your knowledge. You work closely with design to make sure that a design is able to be built and that it has a logical system behind it.
  • Security-minded, You have a detailed understanding of security protocols like OAuth2/OIDC/JWT. You understand client-side cookie authentication and JWT. You should have an understanding of front-end security risks and how to mitigate them.
  • You're highly skilled with web technologies including JavaScript (React/Node), HTML, and CSS. These are important foundational skills for a front-end engineer and impact everything from performance, to maintainability, to accessibility. You understand which features can be used across the various browsers, you understand how to make a website accessible, and you know how to implement responsive design.
  • You have experience architecting complex front-end web applications.We use React/Next.js, but you might have experience with Ember or Angular. You understand the concepts of services, stores, state management, build tools, routing, testing, serverless functions, and API design. You might have experience working with micro front-end applications and you are able to discuss trade-offs when slicing up a front-end app. You have created frameworks and libraries to abstract away complexity in your application to amplify your impact across the team.
  • You have some experience with micro-service/cloud and enterprise architecture patterns. You have an understanding of cloud architecture patterns, like pub-sub and BFF APIs, and are able to work with other engineers to discuss the trade-offs and benefits. While you might not be setting up these systems, you understand how they work, why they're used, and how they can impact front-end app performance, product requirements, and front-end code architecture.
  • You have a strong understanding of design: You understand that as a front-end engineer it is your job to help uphold the quality of the product. You're aware that loss of quality is often death by a thousand cuts and you care when elements are a few pixels off. You're able to understand why particular interactions should be used and when and you're able to recommend particular UI patterns to solve user problems. You'll have contributed to or have built design systems in the past.
attributes.projects:
From the Mayflower to the moon landing, every venture relies on insurance. The $1 trillion insurance industry is fundamental to our economy and society, but remains stuck in the stone age. Incumbents rely on antiquated pen-and-paper process and there's a huge opportunity to transform it through technology. At Newfront, we're building software to supercharge insurance brokers and help them deliver a delightful experience to clients.

While we‚Äôre a technology-driven company, we believe that people and trusted relationships matter. Newfront believes in empowering people rather than "disrupting" them. Our singular mission is to create the future of work for this massive industry.

We believe breakout growth creates breakout opportunities and diversity drives innovation.
attributes.functions:
As an Engineering Lead at Newfront, you will work with a team building features across the platform to help clients manage their risk and supercharge our brokers. There are tons of challenging technical problems to solve that directly impact the lives of your teammates and Newfront clients.

Newfront scales by hiring brokers who join with their book of business. Through automation and artificial intelligence, we eliminate paperwork and pay brokers a higher split of their commission revenue. We represent a paradigm shift in the industry and career path for tens of thousands of brokers.

What you'll work on

  • Lead the development of product features: You'll be involved during product discovery and you'll contribute to the technical design process. You are product-minded and able to collaborate with a Product Manager to define the product roadmap and vision. You'll be responsible for speccing and guiding your team in building out features and infrastructure.
  • Shape business processes: As Newfront is a technology-enabled brokerage, we are looking for new ways to improve business processes by using technology. You will become the expert on how an area of the business functions and work directly with stakeholders to build optimizations.
  • Define technical direction: You will help shape the technical vision and roadmap for a large area of the product. You will also influence best practices and introduce new technologies when appropriate. You'll need to clearly communicate your vision with the team to gain support and a shared understanding of the technologies.
  • Mentor other engineers: You will working with more junior engineers on your team to help them grow and develop their skills.
attributes.benefits:
• $50k-$100k USD (based on experience)
  • All employees receive equity (based on experience)
  • $500 work from home stipend
  • Unlimited vacation
attributes.desirable:
• Proficiency with Typescript, React, Jest, and Next.js.
  • Experience with styled-components or similar CSS-in-JS libraries.
  • Understanding of containerization technologies such as Docker.
  • Experience using Vercel to deploy applications.
  • Experience with Node.js and/or serverless functions.

attributes.company.data.attributes.descr: Laskie is the first platform designed to precisely match candidates with curated job opportunities. Our Platform leverages detailed tags on jobs and candidate profiles to identify the matches that are most likely to end with a job offer.
attributes.company.data.attributes.proje:
At Darwin Homes, we fundamentally believe that the rental experience is broken. Too often, property management‚Äîserving as the middleman between investors and residents‚Äîoften means shoddy service, hidden fees, and inefficient processes that shortchange everybody involved.

Darwin was built to make residents and investors lives easier through an innovative ecosystem of technologies. We have created the best product in the market for residents to discover, tour and lease their future home; and for investors to have complete peace of mind from our modern management and leasing services built around our core values of transparency and professionalism.

Darwin Homes is the destination for single-family rental services for property investors and residents.
attributes.company.data.attributes.benef:
The Darwin Homes team is composed of a diverse set of alumni from DoorDash, Square, Facebook, Apple, LinkedIn and other top technology companies. The founders and executive team have over 30+ years of combined experience in scaling disruptive technology and operations-focused businesses. Darwin Homes is backed by top Silicon Valley venture capital.

Note: This position is fully remote however the majority of the team is based in Austin,TX.

attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
Vamos un poco m√°s all√°‚Ä¶

Somos el marketplace de productos y servicios m√°s grande de Chile y formamos parte del grupo Frontier Digital Ventures, FDV, junto con 16 otros marketplaces ubicados en Latam, Asia y √Åfrica, con foco en el desarrollo de marcas l√≠deres locales.

En 2021 cumplimos 10 a√±os siendo una marca consolidada y l√≠der en el mercado chileno y vamos a celebrarlo como corresponde. Estamos trabajando en varios proyectos para mejorar la experiencia de nuestros usuarios, por lo que el desaf√≠o profesional de ser parte de esos cambios nos motiva mucho.

Somos una empresa joven, √°gil y donde tu libertad creativa est√° m√°s que garantizada. Creemos en una cultura horizontal donde cada uno de nosotros cuenta, siendo las personas el pilar principal de nuestra organizaci√≥n.

¬øSabes cu√°ntas personas nos visitan?

Todos los d√≠as nos visitan m√°s de 500 mil personas. ¬°Son muchos los que son parte de nuestra comunidad! Los movimientos en nuestro sitio son un reflejo del mercado chileno y es por esto que tenemos que estar atentos a las necesidades de los consumidores para saber satisfacerlas con un producto efectivo y f√°cil de usar.

En Yapo.cl se venden 9 autos cada hora, m√°s de 2.300 propiedades se transan al mes y m√°s de 480 mil personas buscan su trabajo en Yapo.cl cada mes.

Diversidad e inclusi√≥n en Yapo.cl

La base de nuestros comportamientos es la diversidad y la inclusi√≥n. Creemos que tener un lugar de trabajo donde se cuide la igualdad de oportunidades para todos es fundamental para un buen ambiente laboral.

Para eso, trabajamos en conjunto con el equipo de Changemakers, un grupo de colaboradores de Yapo de distintas √°reas, para hacer conversatorios, charlas y distintas acciones sobre temas de diversidad e inclusi√≥n en todas sus formas.

Trabajamos d√≠a a d√≠a para mantener un equilibrio de g√©nero, sobre todo en los puestos de liderazgo en la compa√±√≠a y tenemos compa√±eros de trabajo de Colombia, Per√∫, Argentina, Uruguay, Brasil, Italia, Venezuela, Alemania y Bolivia. Nuestro objetivo es seguir ampliando esta diversidad para que sigamos siendo un equipo que recibe a las personas por sus capacidades y no por su origen o g√©nero.

Somos el marketplace de productos y servicios m√°s grande de chile y nuestra misi√≥n es mejorar la vida cotidiana de todas las personas brind√°ndoles la experiencia transaccional m√°s segura y atractiva para comprar y vender en l√≠nea.
El Head of Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) aplicar√° sus habilidades de liderazgo en ingenier√≠a y su conocimiento de infraestructura y desarrollo de software para impulsar el desarrollo de una plataforma ultra escalable, segura, resiliente y altamente confiable para los productos y servicios de Yapo.cl. Trabajar√° en estrecha colaboraci√≥n con los equipos de producto, desarrollo y anal√≠tica para alinear las iniciativas t√©cnicas con los objetivos estrat√©gicos de la organizaci√≥n. Ser√° responsable de liderar el equipo en la consecuci√≥n de sus objetivos, impulsar las iniciativas de transformaci√≥n DevOps, ser due√±o del estado de la infraestructura, y actuar como un trusted advisor para la organizaci√≥n en temas de plataforma, operaci√≥n, automatizaci√≥n y cambios.

attributes.title: Tech Lead
attributes.description:
You‚Äôll be a good fit for this role if you

  • Have +5 years of software engineering experience.

  • Have experience with software development best practices.
  • Have Strong algorithms and data structures fundamentals.
  • Have Strong SQL fundamentals.
  • Have Experience with systems design and architecture.
  • Think about systems and services and write high quality code.

We definitely want to talk to you if

  • You enjoy working as also as a frontend developer.

attributes.projects: Flat is an iBuyer for the Mexican market, focused on solving the liquidity problem of residential real estate, with a deep tech layer to the traditional home-flipping business, similar to what other players have done in other geographies (Opendoor.com, loft.com.br).Flat offers clear benefits to both sides of the transaction. For sellers, it makes the process easier and faster, with the possibility of immediately sell the asset. For buyers, it guarantees the conditions of the property, a fair purchase price, and a seamless buying experience.
attributes.functions:
We're looking for a talented and driven full-stack engineer, comfortable with building responsive front end experiences, as well as with designing and building rigorous APIs and backend services. You'll have a key role in all stages of our software development process, from capturing input from our graphic design or operations team, to working alongside our engineers in building the most efficient platform for real estate logistics and management.

What you will work on

  • Leading design, build and maintain APIs, services and systems for our internal and external platforms.
  • Leading and working closely with web designers and programmers to produce the website.
  • Ensure debug production issues across services and multiple levels of the stack.
  • Coach and support the team in all phases of the software development lifecycle: analysis, design, implementation, testing and support.
  • Improve engineering standards, tooling, and processes.
  • Lead and collaborate with the engineering team to design and launch new features.
attributes.benefits:
Perks

  • 15 day Aguinaldo
  • 15 day vacation since year 0
  • Stock options
  • Great company culture and office environment

Why Join us at Flat.mx?

You'll join a world-class, highly skilled team of engineers, with an assigned mentor from day 1. Interesting engineering and business challenges, and a culture of openness and welcoming to new ideas. We're located in the heart of the city, Polanco CDMX, close to amazing restaurants and shops. High career growth both in best engineering practices as well as new technologies. Data and result-driven culture.

If you are up for a challenge, we would love to hear from you!

attributes.projects:
Hi, we're Shake. We're a B2B technology company that is creating the best-in-class online review management solution for SMBs through Enterprise. We leverage big data to enable workflows that have never been seen before, with a software as a service approach in Reviewshake and data as a service approach in Datashake.

We're an established business with thousands of paying customers and a team of 20, and are searching for a CTO that can help us get the company to the next stage. As a tech company, you will be one of the most important people in the company and taking ownership will be key. You're a proactive, sharp and self-motivated individual who has successfully shifted from being an individual contributor to being a manager, while still getting your hands dirty from time to time. You love communicating and leading your team towards success, taking us from where we are now to where we want to (or need to) be!
attributes.functions_headline: In a typical day, you will
attributes.functions:
In a typical day, you will:

  • Architect, build and scale new features
  • Be responsible for overall code quality, reviews and unit tests
  • Coach, mentor and support our team of engineers
  • Make sure we‚Äôre meeting our product roadmap
  • Maintain technical documentation
  • Communicate and report progress to the team
attributes.benefits:
Our team is fully-remote and we communicate primarily through Slack, Asana, Google Docs and a few short, weekly meetings via Hangout ‚Äî we believe the best work happens when given lots of uninterrupted time that‚Äôs free of distractions.

  • $60,000 - 120,000 salary (USD per annum)
  • 3 - 6% options
  • 26 days holidays
  • Co-work expenses covered
  • $500 / year learning budget
  • Company device provided

Application process:

  1. 30 minute screening call with our Operations Manager
  2. 60 minute call with our CEO focused on soft skills
  3. 60 minute call with our CEO focused on hard skills
  4. 60 minute paid workshop where our CEO and you work on a problem together
  5. Reference check with 2-3 former colleagues
attributes.desirable:
• Experience with machine learning (text classification, NLP, clustering)
  • Data science (data analysis, visualization)
  • Web scraping (residential proxies, captchas, high throughput)
  • An eye for building beautiful and intuitive apps

attributes.projects:
El Centro de Ciencia del Clima y la Resiliencia (CR)¬≤ es un centro cient√≠fico de excelencia basado en Chile, que genera investigaci√≥n sobre ciencia del clima y la resiliencia desde un enfoque interdisciplinario. Nos organizamos en torno a l√≠neas de investigaci√≥n y temas integrativos.

En esta ocasi√≥n estamos buscando a un Data Engineer para el equipo del tema integrativo de seguridad h√≠drica. Chile est√° sufriendo una megasequ√≠a sin precedentes, y eventos como este van aumentar su frecuencia en las pr√≥ximas d√©cadas. La sequ√≠a conlleva disminuci√≥n en la disponibilidad de agua que, junto a una mayor demanda h√≠drica, instala enormes desaf√≠os: ¬øc√≥mo asegurar el agua para consumo humano? ¬øc√≥mo medir el consumo de las diferentes industrias? ¬øc√≥mo determinar objetivamente zonas en emergencia h√≠drica?
attributes.functions:
Dentro del tema integrativo de seguridad h√≠drica, abordamos estas preguntas mediante la elaboraci√≥n y an√°lisis de una serie de nuevos productos. En particular, estamos reconstruyendo la disponibilidad y usos de agua en las macrocuencas de Chile para el per√≠odo 1950-2020, y sus proyecciones al 2065, para determinar los l√≠mites de uso de agua compatibles con niveles adecuados de seguridad h√≠drica bajo escenarios de cambio clim√°tico.

Queremos que t√∫ formes parte del equipo del tema integrativo, y que, bajo la supervisi√≥n de Camila Alvarez, doctora en Hidrolog√≠a y coordinadora del proyecto, generes la infraestructura, ambiente de desarrollo y pipelines de datos necesarios para sistematizar la implementaci√≥n de un modelo hidrol√≥gico. Este modelo, desarrollado por el Helmholtz Centre for Environmental Research y que ya ha sido calibrado para las cuencas de Chile, estima la disponibilidad de agua hist√≥rica y futura de Chile, en base a diversos sets de datos que han sido desarrollados por integrantes del equipo, incluyendo datos meteorol√≥gicos, cobertura de suelo, propiedades de suelo, caracter√≠sticas vegetacionales, topograf√≠a y geolog√≠a. Para ello, deber√°s sistematizar la implementaci√≥n en producci√≥n de este modelo para que corra bajo diversas condiciones hist√≥ricas y futuras de clima y coberturas de suelo. Lo anterior incluye desarrollar los pipelines y procesos de extracci√≥n, transformaci√≥n y disponibilizaci√≥n de los datos asociados.

La disponibilidad de agua futura bajo diferentes escenarios de manejo del territorio, junto con las proyecciones de usos de agua que estamos desarrollando en el equipo, permitir√° que evaluemos los impactos que las decisiones de desarrollo pa√≠s tendri√°n en la seguridad h√≠drica de Chile.

El proyecto tiene una duraci√≥n fija de 10 meses, entre Marzo 2022 a Diciembre 2022 (mediante un convenio de honorarios). Entendemos que esto no es lo ideal, pero son las condiciones dadas por el financiamiento del proyecto (ANID Sequ√≠a).

En 2021 cumplimos 10 a√±os siendo una marca consolidada y l√≠der en el mercado chileno y vamos a celebrarlo como corresponde. Estamos trabajando en varios proyectos para mejorar la experiencia de nuestros usuarios, por lo que el desaf√≠o profesional de ser parte de esos cambios nos motiva mucho.

Somos una empresa joven, √°gil y donde tu libertad creativa est√° m√°s que garantizada. Creemos en una cultura horizontal donde cada uno de nosotros cuenta, siendo las personas el pilar principal de nuestra organizaci√≥n.

¬øSabes cu√°ntas personas nos visitan?

Todos los d√≠as nos visitan m√°s de 500 mil personas. ¬°Son muchos los que son parte de nuestra comunidad! Los movimientos en nuestro sitio son un reflejo del mercado chileno y es por esto que tenemos que estar atentos a las necesidades de los consumidores para saber satisfacerlas con un producto efectivo y f√°cil de usar.

En Yapo.cl se venden 9 autos cada hora, m√°s de 2.300 propiedades se transan al mes y m√°s de 480 mil personas buscan su trabajo en Yapo.cl cada mes.

Diversidad e inclusi√≥n en Yapo.cl

La base de nuestros comportamientos es la diversidad y la inclusi√≥n. Creemos que tener un lugar de trabajo donde se cuide la igualdad de oportunidades para todos es fundamental para un buen ambiente laboral.

Para eso, trabajamos en conjunto con el equipo de Changemakers, un grupo de colaboradores de Yapo de distintas √°reas, para hacer conversatorios, charlas y distintas acciones sobre temas de diversidad e inclusi√≥n en todas sus formas.

Trabajamos d√≠a a d√≠a para mantener un equilibrio de g√©nero, sobre todo en los puestos de liderazgo en la compa√±√≠a y tenemos compa√±eros de trabajo de Colombia, Per√∫, Argentina, Uruguay, Brasil, Italia, Venezuela, Alemania y Bolivia. Nuestro objetivo es seguir ampliando esta diversidad para que sigamos siendo un equipo que recibe a las personas por sus capacidades y no por su origen o g√©nero.
attributes.company.data.attributes.proje:
Somos el marketplace de productos y servicios m√°s grande de chile y nuestra misi√≥n es mejorar la vida cotidiana de todas las personas brind√°ndoles la experiencia transaccional m√°s segura y atractiva para comprar y vender en l√≠nea.
El Head of Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) aplicar√° sus habilidades de liderazgo en ingenier√≠a y su conocimiento de infraestructura y desarrollo de software para impulsar el desarrollo de una plataforma ultra escalable, segura, resiliente y altamente confiable para los productos y servicios de Yapo.cl. Trabajar√° en estrecha colaboraci√≥n con los equipos de producto, desarrollo y anal√≠tica para alinear las iniciativas t√©cnicas con los objetivos estrat√©gicos de la organizaci√≥n. Ser√° responsable de liderar el equipo en la consecuci√≥n de sus objetivos, impulsar las iniciativas de transformaci√≥n DevOps, ser due√±o del estado de la infraestructura, y actuar como un trusted advisor para la organizaci√≥n en temas de plataforma, operaci√≥n, automatizaci√≥n y cambios.

attributes.title: BI Developer (SQL / Tableau) Remote
attributes.description:
Experience and skills we are looking for:

  • Advanced SQL skills
  • Advanced experience with Tableau or similar reporting software.
  • 3+ years‚Äô experience working with data assets with the purpose of delivering insight.
  • The ability to work with large scale, complex, poorly documented and sometimes incomplete data.
  • Ability to present analytics and insights in an intuitive manner.
  • Ability to comprehend business needs and convert them into analytics requirements.
  • Technically proficient in AWS services would be beneficial
  • Experience working on a SAAS platform would be extremely beneficial
  • Good communication skills and ability to work with key stakeholders to produce a desired outcome.
attributes.projects:
Do what you love and make an impact. Become a Plutorian!

We are in the business of helping companies become software juggernauts. Over the last 9 years we have built an enterprise SAAS platform used by many of the world‚Äôs largest companies (Vodafone, Telefonica, Westpac, Pepsico, Barclays‚Ä¶ just to name a few)

We are a fully remote organisation with people working all over the world. We are are looking for an experienced BI Developer who is passionate, enthusiastic and proactive and want to build their future with us.

We are looking for someone who is motivated by the prospect of delivering valuable, high quality updates to a feature-rich product. You will be joining a highly skilled team that consists of excellent mentors with a great culture of supporting each other that will assist to increase your skill set rapidly. Agile processes are used to ensure that work is effective and efficient.
attributes.functions:
The BI Developer role is based within our Data Team who work together to research, design, build and support end-to-end reporting and analytics solutions for our customers. The BI Developer owns the SQL and Tableau platform for dashboards and analytics. A key focus of this role is to understand our data assets and key metrics and be able to create and maintain dashboards that accurately reflect performance of our analytics product

Your key responsibilities will include:

  • Interpret business requirements into compelling and engaging visual insights and reports utilising Tableau.
  • Hold business stakeholder meetings to develop requirements for a raft of new marketing business reports.
  • Design and develop data models to create clean, logical datasets for reporting and visualisation development.
  • Conduct testing, performance testing and troubleshooting to ensure a rewarding end user experience.
  • Create and maintain comprehensive documentation on dataset designs, data fields used and user access.
  • Provide tableau administration

Shipit nace el 2015 para revolucionar la log√≠stica, con crecimiento promedio de 200% anual en ventas, y un equipo que la rompe.

¬°Invitaci√≥n abierta a todos los ninjas a participar de esta aventura!

Shipit brinda soluciones log√≠sticas integrales al eCommerce, prestando servicios de recolecci√≥n, bodegaje, env√≠o de productos y tecnolog√≠a.

Bajo la promesa ‚ÄúT√∫ vendes, nosotros hacemos el resto‚Äù, el modelo de gesti√≥n los transforma en un aliado estrat√©gico de quienes venden online, porque se encargan de todo el proceso posterior a la venta, devolviendoles tiempo para que se puedan dedicar a vender y escalar su negocio.

Esto se traduce en que los due√±os del negocio ahorran tiempo, costos y las complicaciones propias de la log√≠stica, a trav√©s de la utilizaci√≥n de una plataforma digital amigable, confiable y √°gil.

El proyecto se cre√≥ en agosto de 2015, cuando sus socios fundadores (Allan Guiloff, Ingeniero Comercial U. de Chile, y Jos√© Tom√°s Novoa, Ingeniero Civil UC) renunciaron a sus trabajos en Fundaci√≥n Chile para replicar en Chile un modelo de negocios que ya funciona exitosamente en Estados Unidos, Inglaterra y Brasil, y que en Chile genera ventas por m√°s de US$1.000 millones anuales.

El crecimiento sostenido de Shipit se ha dado gracias a su posicionamiento como un socio estrat√©gico de sus clientes, pues permite que √©stos otorguen una experiencia satisfactoria a quienes compran online.

Para el despacho de los productos, Shipit ha generado una red de alianzas con los m√∫ltiples couriers como: Chilexpress, Blue Express, Starken, 99 minutos, Shippify, Chileparcels, Motopartner, entre otros. A ellos les entregan miles de paquetes diarios, eficientando el proceso de retiro y comunicaci√≥n de cada uno de ellos.

Parte del modelo Shipit se basa en los denominados ‚ÄúH√©roes‚Äù, un grupo de transportistas freelance, y que se encargan de retirar los productos, para luego llevarlos a nuestra bodega m√°s cercana. Ah√≠ se empaquetan, se despachan y se realiza el seguimiento hasta que son entregados al destinatario.

Somos un equipo y tenemos como meta que en el eCommerce se olvide la log√≠stica, y se concentre en hacer crecer su negocio.
Para esto, estamos en la b√∫squeda de un Dise√±ador UI/UX que nos ayude a entregar nuestro servicio de una forma intuitiva y usable por cualquier humano.

Shipit nace el 2015 para revolucionar la log√≠stica, con crecimiento promedio de 200% anual en ventas, y un equipo que la rompe.

¬°Invitaci√≥n abierta a todos los ninjas a participar de esta aventura!
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
Shipit brinda soluciones log√≠sticas integrales al eCommerce, prestando servicios de recolecci√≥n, bodegaje, env√≠o de productos y tecnolog√≠a.

Bajo la promesa ‚ÄúT√∫ vendes, nosotros hacemos el resto‚Äù, el modelo de gesti√≥n los transforma en un aliado estrat√©gico de quienes venden online, porque se encargan de todo el proceso posterior a la venta, devolviendoles tiempo para que se puedan dedicar a vender y escalar su negocio.

Esto se traduce en que los due√±os del negocio ahorran tiempo, costos y las complicaciones propias de la log√≠stica, a trav√©s de la utilizaci√≥n de una plataforma digital amigable, confiable y √°gil.

El proyecto se cre√≥ en agosto de 2015, cuando sus socios fundadores (Allan Guiloff, Ingeniero Comercial U. de Chile, y Jos√© Tom√°s Novoa, Ingeniero Civil UC) renunciaron a sus trabajos en Fundaci√≥n Chile para replicar en Chile un modelo de negocios que ya funciona exitosamente en Estados Unidos, Inglaterra y Brasil, y que en Chile genera ventas por m√°s de US$1.000 millones anuales.

El crecimiento sostenido de Shipit se ha dado gracias a su posicionamiento como un socio estrat√©gico de sus clientes, pues permite que √©stos otorguen una experiencia satisfactoria a quienes compran online.

Para el despacho de los productos, Shipit ha generado una red de alianzas con los m√∫ltiples couriers como: Chilexpress, Blue Express, Starken, 99 minutos, Shippify, Chileparcels, Motopartner, entre otros. A ellos les entregan miles de paquetes diarios, eficientando el proceso de retiro y comunicaci√≥n de cada uno de ellos.

Parte del modelo Shipit se basa en los denominados ‚ÄúH√©roes‚Äù, un grupo de transportistas freelance, y que se encargan de retirar los productos, para luego llevarlos a nuestra bodega m√°s cercana. Ah√≠ se empaquetan, se despachan y se realiza el seguimiento hasta que son entregados al destinatario.
attributes.company.data.attributes.proje:
Shipit nace en el 2015, en base a la necesidad de facilitar a los eCommerce el proceso de env√≠o. 
Empieza con la idea de conectar a los couriers, con conductores, empaquetadores y una plataforma tecnol√≥gica, para lograr ser un intermediario y un complemento log√≠stico para las tiendas. 
Todo empez√≥ haciendo un par de env√≠os al d√≠a desde un garage, hasta hoy que operamos la log√≠stica de +800 eCommerce, haciendo miles de env√≠os diarios y siempre entregando una soluci√≥n simple de usar.
Somos un equipo y tenemos como meta que en el eCommerce se olvide la log√≠stica, y se concentre en hacer crecer su negocio.
Para esto, estamos en la b√∫squeda de un Dise√±ador UI/UX que nos ayude a entregar nuestro servicio de una forma intuitiva y usable por cualquier humano.

attributes.projects:
Qventus provides a real-time decision-making platform for hospital operations. Our mission is to simplify how healthcare operates, so that hospitals and caregivers can focus on delivering the best possible care to patients. We use artificial intelligence and machine learning to create products and solutions that help nurses, doctors, and hospital staff anticipate issues and make operational decisions proactively.

Qventus works with leading public, academic and community hospitals across the United States. The company was recognized by the 2019 Black Book Awards in healthcare for patient flow and by CB Insights as a 2019 top 100 Most Promising Company in Artificial Intelligence. Recently, Qventus won the Robert Wood Johnson Foundation Emergency Response for the Healthcare System Innovation Challenge through its work helping health systems across the country plan for and operate in the COVID pandemic.
attributes.functions: Qventus is looking for a Senior Full Stack Engineer who has a passion for technology and solving interesting challenges. You will design and implement highly scalable systems and algorithms for high throughput, performance, reliability and latency. You will join some of the brightest and extremely hard-working engineers that are driving data driven decisions across the organization. The output of your work will be instrumental in redefining healthcare operations. We‚Äôre taking modern technologies and principles that have been proven in other industries ‚Äî artificial intelligence, machine learning, behavioral science, data science ‚Äî and applying them to healthcare operations. Come help us simplify how healthcare operates!

attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
The Company

Have you ever found yourself or a loved one waiting hours and hours in a hospital Emergency Room to get care? Or have you ever had a surgery scheduled for months in the future that needed to happen sooner? Unfortunately, our healthcare system is full of these types of operational problems. Our work saves lives and helps hospitals cut tens of millions of dollars in operational costs, while improving the quality of care they‚Äôre able to deliver.

Qventus is a real-time decision making platform for hospital operations. Our mission is to simplify how healthcare operates, so that hospitals and caregivers can focus on delivering the best possible care to patients. We use artificial intelligence and machine learning to create products that help nurses, doctors, and hospital staff anticipate issues and make operational decisions proactively.

Qventus works with leading public, academic and community hospitals across the United States. The company was recognized by the 2019 Black Book Awards in healthcare for patient flow and by CB Insights as a 2019 top 100 Most Promising Company in Artificial Intelligence. Recently, Qventus won the Robert Wood Johnson Foundation Emergency Response for the Healthcare System Innovation Challenge through its work helping health systems across the country plan for and operate in the COVID pandemic.

attributes.title: Data Engineer
attributes.description_headline: What will you need to succeed in this role?
attributes.description:
• Experience with relational and non-relational databases.
  • Experience in data loading, using Batch and Streaming processes.
  • Experience with Apache Spark but previous experience with other distributed systems also are appreciated, like Hadoop, Cloudera, Databricks, Cassandra, HBase, Hive, Samza, Faust, Kafka, etc.
  • Proficiency in Python programming language.
  • Familiarity with Cloud technologies. We use AWS and Google Cloud, but experience with others cloud providers is valid.
  • Experience in the creation or development of Data Lakes/Data Lakehouses/Data Warehouses/Datamarts.
  • Experience in projects using Python.
  • You work proactively, responsibly and creatively.
attributes.projects:
Cornershop by Uber is an on-demand grocery app that gives you free time, while your groceries and errands are delivered right to your door. We're a fast growing company operating throughout Latin America and North America, and since our acquisition by Uber, we just keep getting bigger. Relaunched under our new brand name. Cornershop by Uber, we‚Äôre looking to avoca-grow our team. So, if you want to work in an innovative environment, with a startup footprint, people who live for bad jokes and dad humor, you've come to the right place!

How many engineers does it take to build an app that simplifies grocery shopping for users? At least 600, because that‚Äôs how many we have in our Engineering team, working from different countries in South and North America. The Engineering team is dedicated to producing intuitive technology for customers, shoppers and stores and solving challenges along the way.
attributes.functions:
At Cornershop, we are looking for a Data Engineer. We are facing new challenges related to the storage, processing and use of large volumes of data. The Data Engineer will work on the analysis, design and implementation of Big Data solutions together with different teams to scale multiple aspects of the organization. These solutions require various technologies and architectures to filter, transform and store data so that engineers, data scientists and business intelligence analysts can use it regardless of the scale of the data.

What will you do?

  • Work on the analysis, design and implementation of Big Data solutions, together with different teams to scale multiple aspects of the organization.
  • Include various technologies and architectures in these solutions to filter, transform and store data so that Engineers, Data Scientists and Business Intelligence Analysts can use it regardless of its scale.

En Cornershop, estamos enfocados en promover un ambiente laboral inclusivo y accesible, donde todas las personas se sientan valoradas, respetadas y apoyadas. Continuamos construyendo una fuerza de trabajo que refleje la diversidad de nuestros clientes y comunidades en donde vivimos y servimos.

attributes.title: Full-Stack Engineer (.NET / React)
attributes.description:
We are looking for passionate, enthusiastic and proactive people that want to build their future with us.

We are looking for someone who is motivated by the prospect of delivering valuable, high quality updates to a feature-rich product. You will be designing and building features for our web and mobile applications and will need to understand considerations such as design for performance, usability and security.

You will be joining a highly skilled team that consists of excellent mentors with a great culture of supporting each other that will assist to increase your skill set rapidly. Agile processes are used to ensure that work is effective and efficient.

Experience and skill we are looking for

  • You have deep knowledge and experience in application development with .Net C# - ideally .net core
  • Experience with Angular or React for front end development
  • You have experience with modern javascript frameworks
  • You understand the design, implementation and operation of distributed Microservices and APIs
  • Understanding of API Security Best Practices
  • Experience in Entity Framework, EF Core, SQL Server/PostgreSQL
  • You have experience with CI/CD pipeline tools (Git, Terraform, Cypress, TeamCity, Octopus Deploy)
  • Technically proficient in AWS services (EC2, ECS, RDS, Lambda, S3 etc)
  • Experience working on a SAAS platform would be extremely beneficial
  • Good communication skills and ability to work with key stakeholders to produce a desired outcome.
  • You are proficient in English, both spoken and written. You are comfortable discussing technical topics in English and explaining yourself through written form (Slack / Confluence)
attributes.projects:
Do what you love and make an impact. Become a Plutorian!

We are in the business of helping companies become software juggernauts. Over the last 9 years we have built an enterprise SAAS platform used by many of the world‚Äôs largest companies (Vodafone, Telefonica, Westpac, Pepsico, Barclays‚Ä¶ just to name a few)

We are a fully remote organisation with people working all over the world. We are are looking for an experienced full stack engineer to join our team to help build the future of Plutora. We are in the middle of a major modernisation initiative where we are rolling out .Net 6 and an improved UI using React, it's a great time to join Plutora and not only work on some of the latest tech but also be part of a growing company!
attributes.functions:
You will be part of a cross-functional team that‚Äôs responsible for the full software development life cycle, from conception to deployment. As a Full Stack Engineer, you will influence and support your team to champion and deliver high quality, secure and scalable software.

We are a fully cloud-based platform and we are in the middle of a major modernisation initiative moving to .net 6 - so you‚Äôll be working on the latest and greatest to build the future of Plutora

Your key responsibilities will include:

  • Design, develop, test and deploy high-quality, secure, scalable software
  • Work with team leads, developers, product managers, QA, and devOps to develop solutions that drive our business goals, make work easier for our customers and deliver good performance, scalability, and reliability.
  • Participate in and help drive the best possible ways of working for software development including Continuous Improvement, CI/CD and test automation.
  • Ensure code quality and maintainability by tackling tech debt, conducting code reviews, initiate refactoring and improve build and test systems
attributes.benefits: Most of our product engineering team are based in Australia, so this role will require a slight adjustment of working hours to ensure maximum work day coverage between Sydney and South America.
attributes.modality.data.attributes.name: Full time
attributes.company.data.attributes.name: Plutora

attributes.title: Back-end Developer

attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
¬øQu√© es Lemontech?

Lemontech es una empresa SaaS (software as a service). Al principio solo hac√≠amos software para abogados, pero ahora somos key players dentro de la industria legal (ahhh!).

El objetivo de nuestro viaje es hacer los procesos menos burocr√°ticos, y m√°s digitales. O como dice nuestro prop√≥sito: Transformar hoy la industria legal del ma√±ana, para simplificar la vida de las personas. ;)

En cifras: estamos en el mercado desde 2007. Tenemos 2 softwares, con m√°s de 12.000 usuarios activos de una base de 1.300 clientes en toda Latinoam√©rica. Y desde 2019 subimos de nivel y somos parte de Accel-KKR, un fondo de inversiones de Silicon Valley especializado en empresas Tech (that means we are world class right now!).


¬øC√≥mo es el equipo Lemontech?

Somos un equipo multidisciplinario e internacional. Inteligentes y buena onda. Extraordinarios, pero disfrazados de gente com√∫n y corriente. Sencillos pero bien condimentados. Algo as√≠ como una mezcla entre completos, teque√±os, ceviche y tacos (pero la versi√≥n saludable, obvio).
‚Äç
Tenemos m√∫sicos, humoristas, pintores, deportistas, influencers, artistas gr√°ficos y chefs. Tambi√©n aficionados a la lectura, a los juegos, a la jardiner√≠a y a los idiomas. Fun fact: entre todos hay personas que hablan espa√±ol, ingl√©s, alem√°n, franc√©s, portugu√©s, maracucho y japon√©s. Cintia est√° aprendiendo coreano y Ezequiel trat√≥ de aprender ruso, pero le fue m√°s o menos (kudos si sabes ruso y nos puedes ense√±ar).

Como grupo nos gustan varias cosas, pero hay 2 que sobresalen por sobre el resto: los teque√±os (gracias Evelyn por evangelizarnos con semejante manjar), y el Cat√°n. En Lemontech encontrar√°s de ambos bastante seguido. De hecho, siempre estamos organizando cosas para hacer el trabajo m√°s ameno, como cuando celebramos los cumplea√±os del mes con pizzas y cervezas (cuando estamos en la oficina, el √∫ltimo jueves de cada mes!). Ah, y NOS ENCANTAN LOS MEMES.

‚Äç- ¬°Buena! ¬øpero c√≥mo trabajan?

Lemontech est√° lleno de cracks organizados por √°reas: people & culture, finanzas y administraci√≥n, ingenier√≠a, producto, marketing, ventas, soporte y clientes. Cada quien se dedica a su especialidad, y trabajamos bastante colaborando entre equipos. Pero todos con un solo objetivo: replicar el Lemon Effect en todo lo que hacemos (el Lemon Effect: Disrumpimos Ayer. Transformamos hoy. Simplificamos ma√±ana).

Queremos ser nada m√°s y nada menos que el primer unicornio SaaS de Latinoam√©rica, e impactar tangible y positivamente en el sistema judicial de los pa√≠ses donde estamos inmersos. O sea, dejar el mundo mejor de como lo encontramos.
attributes.company.data.attributes.proje:
Somos una empresa chilena SaaS, joven, diversa y en un momento de gran crecimiento. Actualmente estamos buscando incorporar a nuestro equipo a un/a Dise√±ador/a UX/IU con al menos 1 a√±o de experiencia en roles similares para ser un apoyo estrat√©gico en nuevos grandes desaf√≠os que se vienen a uno de nuestros productos estrellas. Hoy tenemos presencia en m√°s de 18 pa√≠ses con fuerte foco en Chile, M√©xico, Per√∫ y Colombia. 
Tenemos grandes desaf√≠os y cada d√≠a tenemos m√°s usuarios alrededor del mundo, en todos los pa√≠ses, todos los idiomas y a toda hora! Poder atender un p√∫blico as√≠ de grande es, adem√°s de muy entretenido y desafiante, una gran oportunidad para crecer, aprender y desarrollarse profesionalmente.
Estamos buscando un UXUI Designer para unirse a la c√©lula de uno de nuestros productos en donde trabajar√° en conjunto con el equipo UX UI y con un Product Owner, por lo que tendr√° todo el apoyo del √°rea para realizar sus tareas con lineamientos claros y con mucho espacio para aportar

attributes.projects:
Why Vacasa

We started with just one home and an idea: to bring homeowners and renters together with smart technology and caring local teams. Today, we‚Äôre the largest full-service vacation rental company in the US thanks to the people who give us their best every day. You‚Äôll fit right in here if you‚Äôre curious, collaborative, innovative, and thrive in a rapid-growth environment.

Do you want to be part of a team helping the largest vacation property management company in the US solve problems on a global scale? Are you excited to explore the benefits of scalability and performance by leveraging modern, cloud-based technologies? At Vacasa, we are constantly experimenting and fine-tuning our products. We value stability, security, and scalability.
attributes.functions:
As an Engineering Team Lead, you will be accountable for the team‚Äôs output and growth. At Vacasa, Team Leads manage engineers and are hands-on contributors, with varying percentage based on team‚Äôs needs. Here‚Äôs some of what you will do with your team:

  • Help design and architect applications and services to support the business
  • Review your team‚Äôs work and provide recommendations via code reviews and discussion
  • Explore new technologies and validate concepts to help your team choose the right tool for the job
  • Utilize predominantly scrum methodology and ensure the team conducts the appropriate ceremonies
  • Drive accountability and quality of team deliverables
  • Ensure appropriate monitoring and instrumentation is implemented for production systems
  • Advocate for quality standards and work with your team to create robust testing capabilities

What you‚Äôll do as a leader

  • Work with your team to deliver robust products
  • Manage a team of software engineers and quality assurance engineers
  • Be an effective bridge between Product and the rest of your team
  • Manage change and contingencies for your team with a Product Manager
  • Participate in and encourage collaborative conversations around problem-solving
  • Provide a productive outlook and ensure all voices are heard to shape your team‚Äôs culture
  • Provide guidance and mentorship to other software engineers on your team
  • Handle disputes and debates fairly and provide timely and direct feedback to all team members
  • Foster a tech culture where you lead by example

attributes.company.data.attributes.proje: En SMU, queremos entregarle la mejor experiencia de compra a nuestros clientes y para eso, confiamos en los datos para entregarnos el mejor conocimiento de estos.  En la Gerencia de Conocimiento y Experiencia de Clientes nos encontramos en la b√∫squeda de un o una Data Engineer para el equipo de Advanced Analytics que nos ayude a transformar los datos en un formato que se pueda analizar f√°cilmente. attributes.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
attributes.description:
Required Skills:
  • Backend: minimum of 5 years with python/django
  • Frontend: minimum of 5 years with js/react
  • Experience with AWS/GCP
You should also have:
  • Massive passion for improving healthcare operations and patient outcomes
  • Experience taking product(s) to market
We really are looking for someone that can hit the ground running. Please do not apply if you are a junior developer.
If interested, please respond to this posting with 2-3 sentences expressing why you think you'd be a great fit. We're looking for someone special because what we're building is special (you will see for yourself), so please make sure that comes through in your statement of interest.
attributes.projects: At Diagnoss, we aim to supercharge the productivity and performance of clinical teams in their electronic health records systems. We built an AI powered assistant that they can use in real-time at the point of patient care. This is a new market category and we're super excited at all the opportunities in our pipeline: clinics, hospitals, and government.
attributes.functions:
In this role, you will be part of the core product team. You will report to both the CTO and the CEO. You will also work with other developers on the team. Depending on your level of English, you will be on customer calls listening to feedback and working with the CEO to decide on future features.

As a full stack dev on a small team, you will be the point person for our software development. You will be responsible for maintenance of our current product as well as future development.

The team will be leaning on your opinion and ideas heavily as decisions for tickets, features, projects, and priorities are made.

We use Jira and Google Chat in our day-to-day work. Although the CEO currently leads stand-ups, you are expected to lead standups and direct the creation of tickets in jira when needed.

Our platform has recently launched and it is now deployed in real clinics with users. We are getting a lot of great feedback which is helping us focus on our roadmap. Much of the work you'll do in the first 3 months will be front-end focused since that's where the bulk of the feedback is coming in. You will be expected to help prioritize tickets and communicate trade-offs to the CEO as we grows.

As far as what it's like to work here, this is very much a fast paced startup environment where everyone is passionate about making the work of doctors more effortless. We have a flat structure and value everyone's expertise. If you're looking to be a core member of a US startup that's building cutting edge technology, and if you're looking for a place that is seeking your ideas and opinions to make decisions, then this is the company for you!
attributes.benefits:
Our mission is to make the work of doctors effortless. We're all about using technology to enhance the productivity and performance of healthcare professionals.
We are a fully remote team that believes in the following values:
-over-communication
-trust
-passion
-user-focused
The main benefit of joining Diagnoss is the opportunity to lead product development and participate at the highest level. As a product owner and leader, you will not be micro-managed. As such, we don't ask too many questions when you have to take time off, pick up your kids from school.
attributes.desirable: It will be a bonus if you have experience building chrome extensions
attributes.modality.data.attributes.name: Full time
attributes.company.data.attributes.name: Diagnoss
attributes.company.data.attributes.descr: AI-powered assistant for doctors
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
Problem: Medical establishments are losing billions of dollars annually due to physician burnout and administrative error.
Solution: the AI powered Diagnoss EHR assistant gives physicians superpowers. It's most anticipated skill is to automate the diagnosis documentation process for physicians. The Diagnoss EHR assistant is focused on making administrative tasks and information retrieval an effortless endeavor for physicians.
Adoption: Chrome extension to be used with web-based EHRs such as Athenahealth.
By building the most robust real-time predictive system for clinical teams, Diagnoss transforms the experience of medical providers from one of frustration to one of inspiration. Think "Gmail Side Panel" + "Grammarly" for EHRs

attributes.description:

WHAT you bring:

  • Experience in Software Engineering, Systems Architecture, Application Design, Development, and Analysis, with previous experience as Tech Lead, Tech Manager, or Lead Developer.
  • Knowledge of banking and/or fintech industry.

  • Knowledge of diverse technologies such as SQL and NoSQL database systems, JSON/RESTful APIs and microservices, enterprise service buses, Swagger, YAML, Jenkins, Kafka, cloud services such as AWS or Openshift.
  • Prior experience integrating with API backends is a plus.

  • Must have strong problem-solving skills: creative, analytical, adaptable, logical and thorough and be willing to work in a team environment.

  • High personal code/development standards (peer testing, unit testing, documentation, etc.)
attributes.projects: Sngular was founded in Madrid, Spain over 20 years ago as an information technology firm developing custom software solutions for some of the leading financial institutions in Europe. Today, we are a team of +900 in Spain, Mexico, Chile, Singapur and the US and provide a wide range of technology solutions to companies around the world in industries as diverse as health, energy and telecommunications. From custom software development to AI, from ecommerce to IoT, we help companies harness and leverage today‚Äôs most cutting edge digital technologies to create value and grow. attributes.functions:
We are looking for a Solution Architect who has worked on highly scalable, high traffic web platforms, or applications with low latency, based on an API ecosystem corporate architecture. You will use your technical expertise and business acumen to ensure our high-value customers are able to grow their business.

The ideal candidate should have developed knowledge of design patterns and software engineering techniques. As a part of a deeply passionate team, you will play a pivotal role in developing new platforms and maintaining existing systems. A strong candidate would also have senior project manager skills and had worked in an agile environment, with large teams and multiple parallel projects, taking care of the management, administrative and bureaucratic tasks, along with building reports, participating in weekly governance meetings, removing impediments and facilitating the work for all sides of the team, with knowledge of banking common flows and tools, and a tech background in the fintech industry.

If you‚Äôre a team player, organized, & looking for an opportunity to develop your career, you're in the right place. We‚Äôre looking for innovative thinkers with a mindset for attacking interesting problems and creating original content.

We are a team of engineers, designers, business analysts and data scientists creating products focused on helping governments and companies to become more agile and connected with their markets through the use of Cloud, Mobile and Big Data Technologies.

Our company was founded in 2006, by a team of Tec de Monterrey‚Äôs graduate students, a leading Latin American University. Ensitech‚Äôs founders were recognized among the Top 100 Northeast Mexico Entrepreneurs.

Innovation has been part of our DNA since our first days, and so we have been creating our own products as well as helping our customer‚Äôs with their most challenging projects. Our software runs Live TV shows as well as industrial processes.

As much as we strive to innovate, we also believe in processes and continous improvement as a way to ensure quality and predictability in our products. Over the years we have nurtured a strong project management culture and have been appraised as a CMMI-Dev/3 company.

attributes.title: Data Engineer Technical Leader
attributes.description_headline: This offer will be a perfect match for you if you have:
attributes.description:
• 2+ years of experience working with IoT.
  • 5+ years of experience working with Python.

attributes.projects:
Hi there! If you‚Äôre looking for a high-impact position in an ambitious software house we‚Äôve got a match for you!

We‚Äôre a solution company focusing on building cloud-based end-to-end SaaS platforms. We‚Äôre a squad of outstanding people creating a productive & fun environment. As our teammate, you‚Äôll get the space to develop yourself further & deepen your knowledge of new technologies with exciting projects.

Our Team is growing rapidly and always looks for new tech talents to welcome onboard. Are you the one? Join the crew and become our next Data Engineer - Technical Leader!
attributes.functions_headline: Your main responsibilities for this position will be:

  • Participating in the requirement discussion meetings and providing feedback on inconsistencies.

We are a Software House specializing in producing premium software, offering its services since 2015.
Our main areas of operation are complex design and implementation of cloud-based applications. Our team accommodates the best specialists in the field, passionates of the newest technology, cherishing an innovative and flexible approach to implementing programming projects.
attributes.company.data.attributes.proje:
Hi there! If you‚Äôre looking for a high-impact position in an ambitious software house we‚Äôve got a match for you!
Acaisoft is a place where amazing people (like you) work together to create a productive and fun environment. With us, you‚Äôll get the space to develop yourself further and deepen your knowledge of new technologies with exciting projects from such fields as IoT and Big Data.
Our Frontend Team accommodates passionates for the newest web technologies and a flexible approach to implementing programming projects.
Depending on the needs, we use TypeScript, React, Angular, JS, NodeJS, NestJS, HTML, CSS, Redis, Docker, K8s, and more. 
We value and apply the best programming practices, friendly code reviews, and a continuous learning approach. We're experienced specialists always ready to give you a helping hand!
Our Team is growing rapidly and always looks for new tech talents to welcome onboard. Are you the one? Join the crew and become our next Senior/Expert DevOps Engineer!

attributes.company.data.attributes.name: KLog.co
attributes.company.data.attributes.descr: KLog.co is the first LATAM company to democratize access to international freight and trade in the region thanks to its intuitive digital platform.
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
KLog.co is the first LATAM company to democratize access to international freight and trade in the region. In just nine years it has been able to position themselves as a solid leader in digitalizing and innovating towards making the logistics ecosystem better for all. Through their intuitive digital supply chain platform, users can book and follow through their shipment fully online, while being able to control, measure and optimize their performance.

The success of KLog.co is a consequence of the vast logistics experience of the team and the latter is the result of a great culture, where its story is about learning, growth and technology. The members share the same story, where they started as apprentices and fought to become what they are today. The company believes in effort and passion over knowledge, since they are convinced that, if you have the attitude, the rest can be learned.

KLog.co today has more than 3,000 clients with operations throughout the Latin American region and hundreds of agents around the world. Their operational offices are located in Chile and Peru and they are in the process of opening offices in Bolivia, Colombia, Panama, Uruguay and Mexico.

We are an early stage biotech start-up based in Chile, Compi√®gne and Paris. At Protera we have developed a platform based on artificial intelligence that allows accelerating the design of proteins of industrial interest, where we are passionate about the design of new generation proteins in industries such as Food, Chemical and Pharma.

We believe that the only way to achieve these new products is through the most sophisticated machinery on earth, proteins, capable of modifying matter on a nano scale and with atomic precision. That is why we are developing a tool based on Deep Learning that allows us to understand how proteins work, and how to adapt them for any required application.

attributes.title: Developer React and Node.js
attributes.description:
The right applicant for this position should:
  • Have experience and interest in working with React and Node js.
  • Have a love of coding and be passionate about learning new technologies.
  • Be excited about working remotely with a flexible schedule.
  • Be willing to co-code and work with a small team of developers to solve problems using tools such as Slack and Google Hangouts.
  • Advanced or Intermediate English Level
  • Feel open to learning new skills, and willing to dive into projects where learning new skills is necessary.
The developer will be involved in the requirements analysis, app design and implementation processes, and will need to have experience with React and Node js. He or she will work with other developers and a Tech Lead to accomplish the goals. Occasionally the developer will need to meet with our clients to gathering requirements or show them progress.
The applicant must be able to demonstrate advanced coding skill during a live interview, where they will be tasked with writing code to solve specific problems.

attributes.modality.data.attributes.name: Full time
attributes.company.data.attributes.name: Corbin and Brooks
attributes.company.data.attributes.descr: Corbin and Brooks is a small privately owned fully remote software and web development company. We work closely with a small number of clients on a long term basis to develop web and software applications and serve as their development team.
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
The Corbin & Brooks team have over 50 years‚Äô combined experience with software and web development, UI and product design. Our roots are in enterprise web application development. In 2014 the energy management SaaS company we co-founded was acquired, and we started a private contracting business. We currently provide extremely responsive custom software development services for a small group of clients. Our specialty is custom development of enterprise software applications, and interactive UI design.

Our philosophy is to work with a small number of clients and serve as their ongoing development team. We strive to work responsively, offer co-coding to ensure multiple team members always understand a code so a project can be picked up at any time, and keep projects on schedule for our clients.

We work 100% remotely, and communicate throughout the day using project management software and videoconferencing when needed.
attributes.company.data.attributes.proje:
Corbin & Brooks is a small privately owned fully remote software and web development company.

We work closely with a limited number of clients on a long term basis to develop web and software applications and serve as their development team for their projects.

We are currently looking for a competent project manager who loves gathering requirements, organizing JIRA boards, talking with clients, zoom meetings, and communicating with our internal team to move projects forward. Our mission is for every project to be on time and within budget.

The project management position won't take the entire 40 hour work week, so we are expecting this person will also perform QA tasks approximately half of the work week. QA requirements will be learning how to run projects locally, testing the features developed by developers, and reporting bugs and issues found.
attributes.company.data.attributes.benef:
Corbin & Brooks offers an extremely flexible work schedule, fully remote work, and lots of flexibility when it comes to planning vacations and time off for life events.

Our projects are almost all long term projects where we are building exciting and innovative web and mobile applications which are being used by real customers in a variety of industries.

We are proud to have a friendly and communicative work environment with a positive team of people across North and South America.

This position is a contract position and the applicant will not technically be an employee of the company, but there will be an expectation of 160 hours of work per month.

We are seeking a Senior API Developer with hands-on experience in defining, developing and providing the operational support service such as monitoring, health and hygiene, and overall availability of the API product offering for critical components of API platform based on a microservices architecture.

* This job is not eligible to be performed in the states of New York, California or Colorado

WHAT you‚Äôll be doing

  • Setup distributed as well as embedded API gateways with various load balancing topologies
  • Deploy API Definitions & Implementations, Policies and Certificates in different environments of IBM API Connect and Mule runtime environments
  • Upgrade the API Infrastructure using the API Connect and MuleSoft in different environments
  • Setup API Analytics for consumption through various channels including ELK and Kafka stack

attributes.company.data.attributes.descr: ZeroFOX, the innovator of social media security, protects modern organizations from the dynamic risks of social media and digital channels. Each day, ZeroFOX cloud-based, SaaS platform processes millions of posts and accounts across the social landscape.
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_: ZeroFOX, the innovator of social media security, protects modern organizations from the dynamic risks of social media and digital channels. Each day, ZeroFOX cloud-based, SaaS platform processes millions of posts and accounts across the social landscape, spanning LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Google+, YouTube and more. Using targeted data collection, intelligent analysis and automated remediation, ZeroFOX protects businesses around the world against phishing attacks, information loss, account compromise, fraud, compliance violations, and financial loss. Forrester recently named ZeroFOX a Leader and Top-Ranked in Strategy for Digital Risk Monitoring in The Forrester Wave: Digital Risk Monitoring, Q3 2016. Led by a team of information security and high-growth start-up veterans, ZeroFOX has raised over $80M in funding from NEA, Highland Capital and others, and has collected top industry awards such as the SINET16 Champion, DarkReading‚Äôs Top Security Startups to Watch, and the Security Tech Trailblazer of the Year.
attributes.company.data.attributes.proje: ZeroFOX seeks an experienced Business Intelligence Engineer to join our Business Intelligence team. As an early hire to our BI Engineering team, you‚Äôll help build the backbone for data and analytics infrastructure across the organization. You‚Äôll work with Business Intelligence Analysts, Systems Admins, Engineering Teams, as well as other internal teams to drive towards more of a self-service analytics structure for our data driven organization. You‚Äôll also support the relationship between Technology and BI teams as we build out a world-class data warehouse for our business and customers. If you are a self starter, excited about building a data-driven culture, and motivated by making an impact, then you may have found your next role!

• Amazing Product: ZeroFOX has created a paradigm-shifting cybersecurity product that has been recognized as leading the next generation of predictive cyber solutions.

¬°Estamos en b√∫squeda de un Equipo completo de Desarrolladores!

¬øA qu√© nos dedicamos?
Credit√∫ es una administradora de mutuos hipotecarios endosables, en palabras simples otorga cr√©ditos hipotecarios a clientes individuales que quieren comprar una propiedad y estos son financiados por la venta de mutuos a clientes institucionales (inversionistas).

Se est√° desarrollando un producto digital con los siguientes lineamientos:

  • Concebido de cara a sus usuarios (clientes institucionales e individuales, ejecutivos backoffice).
  • Si algo en el proceso se puede automatizar, se hace.
  • El producto es el sistema y el sistema es el producto. Cualquier cambio en el proceso implica un cambio en ambos.
  • No es una plataforma de plan de recursos empresariales(ERP), sino que el proceso y la operaci√≥n ocurren a trav√©s de la plataforma.
attributes.functions: En Credit√∫ trabajamos con filosof√≠as AGILE y el framework Large-Scale Scrum. El equipo de pagos es multidisciplinario, eso significa que est√° integrado por profesionales que deben hacerse cargo de todo el ciclo de vida del producto. El equipo de pagos es auto-organizado, eso significa que en lugar de recoger requerimientos desde otros departamentos o desde la gerencia, el backlog del producto se va poblando seg√∫n lo que el equipo reconozca necesario hacer para ir incrementando el producto.

attributes.modality.data.attributes.name: Full time
attributes.company.data.attributes.name: Corbin and Brooks
attributes.company.data.attributes.descr: Corbin and Brooks is a small privately owned fully remote software and web development company. We work closely with a small number of clients on a long term basis to develop web and software applications and serve as their development team.
attributes.company.data.attributes.long_:
The Corbin & Brooks team have over 50 years‚Äô combined experience with software and web development, UI and product design. Our roots are in enterprise web application development. In 2014 the energy management SaaS company we co-founded was acquired, and we started a private contracting business. We currently provide extremely responsive custom software development services for a small group of clients. Our specialty is custom development of enterprise software applications, and interactive UI design.

Our philosophy is to work with a small number of clients and serve as their ongoing development team. We strive to work responsively, offer co-coding to ensure multiple team members always understand a code so a project can be picked up at any time, and keep projects on schedule for our clients.

We work 100% remotely, and communicate throughout the day using project management software and videoconferencing when needed.
attributes.company.data.attributes.proje:
Corbin & Brooks is a small privately owned fully remote software and web development company.

We work closely with a limited number of clients on a long term basis to develop web and software applications and serve as their development team for their projects.

We are currently looking for a competent project manager who loves gathering requirements, organizing JIRA boards, talking with clients, zoom meetings, and communicating with our internal team to move projects forward. Our mission is for every project to be on time and within budget.

The project management position won't take the entire 40 hour work week, so we are expecting this person will also perform QA tasks approximately half of the work week. QA requirements will be learning how to run projects locally, testing the features developed by developers, and reporting bugs and issues found.
attributes.company.data.attributes.benef:
Corbin & Brooks offers an extremely flexible work schedule, fully remote work, and lots of flexibility when it comes to planning vacations and time off for life events.

Our projects are almost all long term projects where we are building exciting and innovative web and mobile applications which are being used by real customers in a variety of industries.

We are proud to have a friendly and communicative work environment with a positive team of people across North and South America.

This position is a contract position and the applicant will not technically be an employee of the company, but there will be an expectation of 160 hours of work per month.

  • Scalable/high-performance code on both the frontend and backend, understanding complex technical areas along the way
  • Efficient and reusable systems that drive complex web and mobile applications
  • Creating software features that are robust, reliable, and user-friendly for both internal teams and our customer base

attributes.projects:
Clipboard Health is a profitable, post Series B company that is part of Top 100 YC Companies

We exist to lift as many people up the socioeconomic ladder as possible. The average nursing assistant without a college degree makes $36k a year; the average nursing assistant on Clipboard Health makes $53k a year and the top 5% make $74k a year. We dramatically improve lives, by letting healthcare professionals turn extra time & ambition into career growth. We have healthcare professionals texting us photos of a car they were finally able to buy, a school & church they‚Äôre building in their native Haiti with money they earn here, and more.
We‚Äôre a post Series B, extremely fast growing startup with classic two-sided network effects. We‚Äôve grown 6x (across all key metrics) in the last 11 months and need your help to keep growing to serve more healthcare professionals, healthcare facilities, and patients.
attributes.functions:
What‚Äôs weird about working with us?

  • We care, a lot. Our CEO spends substantial time regularly doing customer service, and many of our healthcare professionals and healthcare facility clients have her personal cell phone number.
  • We are globally distributed. Just on the engineering team we have folks from: the United States, Chile, Mongolia, Turkey, India, Ukraine, Indonesia, Brazil, Columbia‚Ä¶ and that‚Äôs just from folks who‚Äôve joined us so far this year.
  • We take our values seriously: our COO literally has a handmade Curiosity Initiative and Ownership sign on his wall (you‚Äôll see it if you videocall him).
  • We have more engineers than we ‚Äúneed‚Äù on purpose. It makes us fast (many features go from idea to production in 2-4 weeks). It also allows small teams to see a problem, and just go fix it. A team went off and created a new SaaS product, another team rewrote a core service under a new architecture.
  • One thing we value is that we have no ‚Äútoes‚Äù here to be stepped on. See a problem? Go ahead and fix it, you don‚Äôt need permission.
attributes.benefits:
Perks of Working with us:

  • Do great work that matters, in healthcare, for customers who could really use your help
  • Zero commute. Work wherever you are, globally (but on or around US Pacific Time hours)
attributes.desirable:
Extra Awesome if you are:

  • A fan of the speed of startups, having worked at one or more (including maybe your own) before
  • Familiar with modern open source technologies like: Next.js (Express.js/React), Tailwind UI, Flutter, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Docker
  • Experienced in developing REST APIs, mobile & web apps that interface with said APIs, on AWS (or similar)

attributes.projects:
Credit√∫ es una administradora de mutuos hipotecarios endosables: otorga cr√©ditos hipotecarios a clientes individuales que necesiten comprar una propiedad, que a su vez son financiados por la venta de mutuos a clientes institucionales (inversionistas).
Con total apoyo de la gerencia, Credit√∫ se encuentra en plena transformaci√≥n digital. Esto es relevante porque significa que en la empresa no hay stoppers que impidan un flujo de trabajo √°gil.
Se est√° desarrollando un producto digital, en torno a los siguientes lineamientos:

  • Concebido de cara a sus usuarios (clientes institucionales, clientes individuales, ejecutivos backoffice).
  • Si algo en el proceso se puede automatizar, se va a automatizar.
  • El producto es el sistema, y el sistema es el producto. Cualquier cambio en el proceso implica un cambio en el sistema y por lo tanto un cambio en el producto.

attributes.functions:
En Credit√∫ trabajamos con filosof√≠as AGILE y el framework Large-Scale Scrum. El equipo de pagos es multidisciplinario, eso significa que est√° integrado por profesionales que deben hacerse cargo de todo el ciclo de vida del producto. El equipo de pagos es auto-organizado, eso significa que en lugar de recoger requerimientos desde otros departamentos o desde la gerencia, el backlog del producto se va poblando seg√∫n lo que el equipo reconozca necesario hacer para ir incrementando el producto.
